title: MWE BANTU BONSE BA PANSHI
lyrics:
1. Mwe bantu bonse ba panshi.
Mulumbanyeni mutote,
No kumutemwa iseni,
Imbeni pa cinso cakwe

2. Ibukisheni ni Lesa
Atubumbile fwe bonse,
Aletukumba nge mpanga,
Pantu ifwe tuli bakwe.

3. Ingileni no mucinshi,
Mupalameni no kwanga
Shina lyakwe lumbuleni,
Ici cine e cisuma.

4. Lesa wesu, e musuma,
Ali no luse kuli ifwe;
'Cine cakwe ciminina
'Nshiku ne nshiku shonse pe

title: ITOTELENI MFUMU NKALAMBA
lyrics:
1. Itoteleni
Mfumu nkalamba,
imbileni mwe;
luse na maka;
Ninkwela yakosa
kuti tuchingwe,
kwi sano ekwaba
ku mulu kwine.

2. Imbenya maka,
Cikuku pamo
Busamo nkansu
Mulu lisano
Mwela na makumbi
Filengo fyakwe
'Cipupu ne mfifi
Nshila ya Mwine

3. 'Calo na fyonse
ifyo, tekweba,
Fyabumbwa kale
Nankwe ku maka
Na ifunde ili
Ailengele
Abike cambeshi
Cicilibishe.

4. Bupe bwamwine
Teti tusose
Nimulwelele
Na mu kasuba;
Bwatula kumpili
Bwaya ku nika,
Bwamoneko bupe
Mume ne mfula

5. 'Bena lukungu
Banaka, ni fwe,
Twacetekela,
Teti mubepe;
Ubupyo busuma
Ebo twapelwa,
Kabumba, Kachinga,
Na Kalubula.

6. Nimwe lubuto
Nimwe uluse,
Batulwa pamo
Bamwimbila pe.
Pamo nefwe bene
Mu nyimbo shesu
Ne ndimi sha cine
Twimbilyo mulu

title: TWAMULUMBANYA MWE LESA
lyrics:
1. Twamulumbanya Mwe Lesa,
Amaka yenu Twaimba,
Abena fyalo batota
Kuli imwe, mwe ba Tata.

2. Ni Aleluya twaimba,
Pamo na batulwa bonse;
Ba mu mulu, ba panonse
Balemwimbila pe na pe.

3. Baleti Mwafya, Mwafya mwe
Lesa Mutotelwe Konse
Panwesonde na mu mulu
Mulimo ne fye bukulu.

4. Batumikisha balipo,
Balifukisho lwimbo,
Bakasesema babula
Fyonse fya bu-Aleluya

5. Na bafwililwa pa Mfumu,
Babilikisha mu mulu;
Cilonganino ca pano
Cilefukisho lwimbo.

6. Lulumbi Iube Kuli mwe,
Mwe Lesa Tata pe na pe;
Ku Mwana na Ku Mupashi,
Lesa umo, wa mu mulu.

title: WA MUSHILO WINE, LESA WA MAKA
lyrics:
1. Wa mushilo wine, Lesa wa maka,
Bwaco bwa musamwa; twaisa mwimbila,
Wa mushilo wine, wa luse, wa maka,
Umo, batatu, Lesa wacila!

2. Wa mushilo wine, bemba bashila
Balelumba Imwe, baletotalako;
Bonse ba mu mulu bawa, baletila,
"Uwali, uli, wakulabako."

3. Wa mushilo wine, ushimoneka,
Ne fwe bantu babi tatwingamutamba;
Wa mushilo ni mwe; mwabafye Kateka
Wa cine cine, no wa bulamba.

4. Wa mushilo wine, Lesa mu mulu,
Ncito shenu shonse shilemulumbanya,
Wa mushilo wine, wa luse na maka,
Lesa patatu, Lesa wapalwa.

title: SHIKULU E MFUMU; CALO
lyrics:
1. Shikulu e Mfumu; calo
Cisekelele ne myulu,
Konse Konse cilumbuke
Ifyo Shikulu e Shifwe.

2. Shikulu e Mfumu; nani
Ulemukana ne fibi?
Nelyo Kumungwimgwintika,
No kukana musumina?

3. Shikulu e Mfumu; kanshi
Kapingula, Mupusushi;
Nshila shakwe e sha cine,
Abantu bese muwile.

4. Ateka; mwe basambi mwe,
Mwakulalumbanya Shifwe,
Na Yesu aba mu mulu,
Uwatanikwe ngo muntu.

5. Awe, teti apumbie,
Nelyo uluse lucepe,
Abena mwakwe beleka
Kwimbe fyo Shifwe ateka.

title: SHIFWE WA LUSE LWAKULA
lyrics:
1. Shifwe wa luse lwakula,
Mwatupa fye Cilubula,
Kwi sano lwemu tulambe,
Mwe ba luse, mutusambe.

2. Mwe Mwana, Shiwi mu buntu,
Mwe Ngulu, Lambo, mwe Mfumu,
Kwi sano lyenu tulambe,
Cikuku cenu tutambe.

3. Mupashi mwe wa mushilo,
Mwalula bafwe ba mweo,
Kwi sano lyenu tulambe,
Na Kuli ifwe mubombe.

4. Shifwe, Mupashi, no Mwana,
Patatu umo, wa nkama,
Kwi sano lyenu mulanga,
No mweo wa pe tusanga.

title: TUCINDIKE NO KWANGA
lyrics:
1. Tucindike no kwanga,
Lesa wesu musuma

Aba no luse lwa pe
Pa pantu bakwe bonse.

2. Tulumbule ishina,
Ni Lesa Mwine eka.

3. Ababumbile icalo,
No kwisusho lubuto.

4. Musuma Kuli bonse
E ulelela fyone.

5. Alebatangilila
Bantu bakwe mu nshila.

6. Atumona no luse,
Fwe balanda, fwe ba fye.

7. Tulelumba na nomba
Lesa wesu musuma.

title: WE MUTIMA, ULUMBANYE
lyrics:
1. We mutima, ulumbanye
Mfumu yesu ya mu mulu;
Walubulwa, waelelwa,
Nani wa kwimbilo lu?
Ulumbanye, ulumbanye,
Lumbanye Mfumu ya pe

2. Mulumbanishisho bupe
Batata bapelwo bu,
Mu busanswo baikele,
Abapokolowemo.
Ulumbanye, ulumbanye,
Lumbanye Mfumu ya pe.

3. Nga Tata aletuteka,
Twanaka aishiba;
Mu maboko atusenda,
Atupokolola pe,
Ulumbanye, ulumbanye,
Lumbanye Mfumu ya pe.

4. Bonse mu mulu mutwafwe
Kuti tutote bwino,
Mwashuka ukuba nankwe,
Mumumona pa menso;
Ulumbanye, ulumbanye,
Lumbanye Mfumu ya pe.

title: FIBUMBWA FYONSE FYA PANSHI
lyrics:
1. Fibumbwa fyonse fya panshi
Aleni, twimbile Mfumu,
Aleluya, Aleluya,
We kasuba wabalika,
Nobe we mwenshi bushiku,
Mulumbanye, mulumbanye;
Aleluya, Aleluya, Aleluya.

2. We mwela wa cipupu we,
We kumbi lyayo lubilo,
Mulumbanye, Aleluya,
Bwaca buletasha Mfumu,
Myengelele, imye shiwi,
Mulumbanye, mulumbanye;
Aleluya, Aleluya, Aleluya.

3. Mumana we mu kupita,
Bulo lwimbo no kutasha
Mfumu Lesa, shilimbeni,
Mulilo wa kwafwa bantu,
No kubapelo lubuto,
Imye shiwi mulumbanye
Aleluya, Aleluya, Aleluya

4. We mayo calo nshiku pe
Watupe fyakulya fyonse,
Ulwimbo mwimbileni,
Fimuti na maluba, mwe,
Langeni lulumbi lwakwe,
Toteleni Mfumu Lesa;
Aleluya, Aleluya, Aleluya.

5. Abatemwana mu bantu,
Abelelana, imbeni,
Temwisheni Mfumu yenu.
Na balecula nshiku pe
Basansamuke babula
Shiwi ili lya kutota;
Aleluya, Aleluya, Aleluya.

6. We mfwa yaisa Kuli fwe,
Mu kutalala, shiili,
Tatutina, we munensu,
Niwe nkombe ya kwa Tata,
Wasendo mwana ku mwabo,
We mfwa mune, we mutembo;
Aleluya, Aleluya, Aleluya

7. Fibumbwa fyonse fya panshi
Filumbanye no mucinshi
Lesa wesu, Mfumu yesu.
Tasheni Tata no Mwana,
Mupashi nao Wabuta;
Lumbanyeni, batasheni;
Aleluya, Aleluya, Aleluya.

title: INDIMI SHINGI NDEFWAYA
lyrics:
1. Indimi shingi ndefwaya
Sha kwimbile Mfumu;
Ululumbi lwa kwa Lesa,
Luse ne cikuku.

2. Mwe Mfumu Lesa shikulu,
Ukwimba mungafwe;
No kushimikila kuno
Ifye shina lyenu.

3. Yesu, ishina lisuma,
Litamfye cikonko;
E lyawama ku bapipa,
Mutende no mweo.

4. Onaula maka yabi
Mubi akakula;
Amusamba no mulopa,
Kanshi ansambe 'ne.

5. Asosa, no kumfwe shiwi
Abafwa baima,
Basekela abakabi,
Baanga bapina.

6. Mumfwe, we wakoma matwe;
Cibulu, mulumbe;
We mpofu moneMfumwi yi;
Cilema ciluke.

7. Mwe bena fyalo moneni
Kuli Lesa wenu;
Muloleshe, mupusuke,
Mube ne cikuku.

title: SUMBULENI IMITWE MWE
lyrics:
1. Sumbuleni imitwe mwe!
Mwe mpongolo sha pe.
Musumbuke mwe fipata,
Imfumu ingile.

Bushe, nani imfumwi yi?
Te Mfumu ikulu?
Yehofa uwakosa pe,
Wa maka mu bulwi.

2. Sumbuleni imitwe mwe!
Mwe mpongolo sha pe,
Musumbuke mwe fipata,
Imfumu ingile.

Lelo nani, imfumwi yi?
Mfumu Lesa wa maka,
Wa bukata, wa lulumbi,
Ni Lesa wesu pe;
Wa bukata, wa lulumbi,
Ni Lesa wesu pe.

Aleluya! Aleluya! Aleluya!
Amen, Amen, Amen.

title: TULUMBANISHA MAKA YE
lyrics:
1. Tulumbanisha maka ye
'Shina lyakwa Yesu;
Abangeli na bantu fye,
Balumbanye shina,
Shina lya kwa Yesu.

2. Abafwile balumbanye
Wanina ku mulu;
Wa kwishinte lya kwa Yese
Balumbanye shina
'Shina lya kwa Yesu.

3. Abasumina panonse
Abwa balubuka;
Na baletulwa ku luse,
Balumbanye shina,
'Shina lya kwa Yesu.

4. Abelelwa te kulaba
Ifyo achulile;
Bamuletele ubupe,
Balumbanye shina
'Shina lya kwa Yesu.

5. Abena fyalo bandimi
Shonse sha panonse;
Balete kuno mucinshi,
Balumbanye shina,
'Shina lya kwa Yesu.

6. Ba panonse, 'ba mu mulu
Bonse bamuwile;
Bemba ulwimbo lumo fye,
Balumbanye shina
'Shina lya kwa Yesu.

title: LUMBANYENI YESU UWATUUBULA
lyrics:
1. Lumbanyeni Yesu uwatulubula,
Imbisheni bonse ba panonse;

Celeleni Yesu, mwe bali mu mulu,
Ishina lipelwo bucindamo.
Nga kakumba, Yesu abaka bana,
Mu maboko alabasenda pe.
Lumbanyeni, lumbuleni ubukulu,
Mwimbileni no lwimbo pe na pe.

2. Lumbanyeni Yesu uwatulubula,
Aculile, apelelwe, afwa;
Wene libwe lyesu ilya bupususho,
Celeleni Yesu watanikwe.
Temwisheni Yesu watufwilile,
'Luse, congwe, no kutemwa kwa pe.
Lumbanyeni, lumbuleni ubukulu,
Mwimbileni ni lwimbo pe na pe.

3. Lumbanyeni Yesu uwatulubula,
NaHosana ku mulu kwaumfwa;
Yesu wne abelelyo kuteka,
Lumbanyeni kayula ne Mfumu.
Uwa kwisa e ukacimfya bonse
Alikwata maka no lulumbi.
Lumbanyeni lumbuleni ubukulu
Mwimbileni no lwimbo pe na pe.

title: TUSEKELYO MWINE
lyrics:
1. Tusekelyo Mwine
Ni Mfumu ya bantu,
Tumutotele fwe,
No kwimbile Mfumu;

Imye shiwi, no mutima,
Sekela no kusekela

2. Yesu ni Katula,
Aleteka bantu;
'Lintu atufwila
Anina ku mulu.

3. Ubufumu bwakwe
Tekuti bupwe yo;
Uluse akwata
Lwa mfwa no lwa kumbo.

4. Amaka 'kananye
Basuke bacimbe
Bonse abalwani;
Ku Mfumu balambe.

5. Imfumu ikesa
Ku kusenda nkuta,
Shiye kuli Lesa
Kwi sano lyashila.

title: NATOTLWE LESA, WA MAKA YONSE
lyrics:
1. Natotelwe Lesa, wa maka yonse,
Atemenwe calo kupela Mwane;
Uwatufwilile kwi paki lyesu,
Atwiswilo mulu 'fwe twingilemo.

Mwimbile! Mwimbile! calo cumfwe naco,
Mwimbile! Mwimbile! babe no buseko;
Isa kuli Lesa mu Mwana wakwe,
Umulumbanishe, wa maka yonse.

2. Ubu bulubulo ubwa mulopa.
E bulayo bwine ku wasumina;
Na ku wabipisha nga nasumina,
Kashita kenyako alaelelwa.

3. Alitufundishe, alituwamishe,
Na ifwe twalyanga mu Mwana wakwe;
Lelo tukacila mu kusekela.
Ilyo twamumona Yesu Katula.

title: MAKANA NA MAKANA
lyrics:
1. Makana na makana
Ya bafwikwa tutu,
Ifita fya balubulwa
Fyanina ku mulu,
Fyapwa! fyonse nafipwa,
Ukulwa ne fibi;
Beswileni ifipata,
Aba kabengile.

Aleluya! Aleluya!
kuuwatufwilile;
Aleluya! Aleluya!
Nao alimine.

2. 'Nyimbo sha Aleluya
Sha calo no mulu!
'Kulisha kwa masese kwa
Twebelyo bwanshisho.
We bushiku busuma,
Bwa fyabumbwa fyonse;
We nseko, ulefumyapo
Ubulanda bonse.

3. E, tukaceleshanya
Mu mulu mwi shilya;
Pa kukumanye fubusa
No kushilekana.
Amenso yakawama,
'Yalile filamba,
Tabalimo bakashiwa,
Neyo mukamfwilwa.

4. Mwe Mfumu, bupalame
'Bupususho bwenu;
Ba ku mulu mubalembe,
Mwe ka mube Mfumu.
mwe bafwaikwa, mwise,
'Basha bafuluka;
'Bulangililo mubape,
Mwe Mfumu, katula.

title: NE SESE NE PENGA 'BENGI BALIKO
lyrics:
1. Ne sese ne penga 'bengi baliko,
Na mu cinso ca Mfumu baimbo lwimbo:

Kuli uyo watutemwa, watulubula,
Kuli wenya lulumbi inshiku shonse.

2. Abalya babipa bali mu cinso,
Balifwikwe fyabuta no kwimba pamo:

3. Acita bapipa babe ba Mfumu,
Atutula, twafundwa, twimbyo lwimbo lu.

4. Twali fye mu mfifi, twali abasha,
Lelo alitusamba, twasangululwa;

5. Tumulumbanishe Imfumu Yesu,
'Kuti bambi pa kumfwa bamwimbilyo lu.

title: PA BUSUMA BWA CALO
lyrics:
1. Pa busuma bwa calo,
Pa busuma bwa mulu,
Pa mulandu wa luse
Uli konse konse:
Shifwe kuli 'mwe lelo
Twimbyo lwimbo lwa nseko.

2. Pa busuma bwa nshita
Sha bushiku kasabu,
Bwa mpili na manika,
Bwa miti na maluba:
Shifwe kuli 'mwe lelo
Twimbyo lwimbo lwa nseka.

3. Panseko sha kutemwa
Kwa bafyashi na bana,
'Fibusa fya panonse
Ifyatwafwa mu luse:
Shifwe kuli 'mwe lelo
Twimbyo lwimbo lwa nseko.

4. Pa mulandu wa bupe
Mutupela panonse,
Bonse ubutuntulu,
Bulafuma ku mulu:
Shifwe kuli 'mwe lelo
Twimbyo lwimbo lwa nseko.

5. Pa Cilonganinwe ci,
Icipepa kuli 'mwe,
Cili mu fyalo fyonse,
Cilatasha kuli 'mwe:
Shifwe kuli 'mwe lelo
Twaimbyo lwimbo lwa nseko.

title: TULUMBANYE LESA
lyrics:
1. Twalumbanye Lesa
No tunwa ne mitima,
Kalenga wa maka
Shifwe uwatutemwa,
E watukushishe
Kufuma ku bwaice,
E utusunga pe
Kufika lelo.

2. Mwe Lesa waluse
Tusungeni mupepi,
Mutwenshe mu nshila
Yenu iya mutende,
Mutupelye maka
Ya kwansha Satana,
Tusuke tufike
Ku bufumu bwenu.

3. Tutotele Lesa
Shifwe, Mwana, Mupashi,
Balumbwe panonse,
Baleteka mu mulu,
Lesa umo wine
Kabumba wa fyonse
Ku kale ne lelo
Inshiku shonse.

title: MWE LESA, KAFWA WA KALE
lyrics:
1. Mwe Lesa. Kafwa wa kale.
Twamucetekela;
'Cubo cesu ku cipupu,
Ne ng'anda yesu pe

2. Abantu benu batemwa,
Apo mubabaka;
'Kuboko kwenu kwa maka
Kwakulatucinga.

3. 'Lintu mpili tashalipo,
'Calo conse pamo
Mu nshita shonse mwe Lesa
Mwaikala umo.

4. Kuli imwe myaka ingi
Ngo bushiku bumo;
'Nshiku shesu nasho bwipi
Ngo mumyo lucelo.

5. 'Myaka yaya ngopjmpana,
Abantu balafwa,
Balabwa fintu cilabwa
'Ciloto lucelo.

6. Mwe Lesa, Kafwa wa kale
Twamucetekela;
Mulame fwe bantu benu
Abo muletemwa.

title: TATA WESU TULI PA NTANSHI PENU
lyrics:
1. Tata wesu tuli pa ntanshi penu;
Mukumane nefwe, mwe Mfumu yesu.

2. Imitima yesu twapela imwe;
Muisambishe, muwamye mwe Bene.

3. Na 'ya menso yabe ya imwe Bene
Yaloleshe fyenu fyeka fya cine.

4. Na maboka yesu yaleba yenu,
Yabombela imwe ku m'limo wenu.

5. Na 'ya molu kuli imwe twapela,
Yende nemwe, yamukonke mu nshila.

6. Ne milomo yesu ibe ya Kristu,
Ilande pe luse lwakwe ku bantu.

7. Na 'ya matwi yabe yenu nshiku pe,
Yomfwikishe paifunde lya Mwine.

8. Pano pene tuleipa kwa Lesa;
Tube fwe benu, mubili no  m'tima.

title: LESA WANDI, LESA WANDI, MPUSUSHENI INE
lyrics:
1. Lesa wandi, Lesa wandi, mpususheni ine,
Lesa wandi, Lesa wandi, mpususheni ine,
Mwi shina lya kwa Yesu Kristu,
Wa kutemwa, wa cukuku, mpususheni ine.

2. Lesa wandi, Lesa wandi, njeleleni ine,
Lesa wandi, Lesa wandi, njeleleni ine,
Mwi shina lya kwa Yesu Kristu,
M'lopa wakwe unsambishe ku kubifye kwandi.

3. Lesa wandi, Lesa wandi, pokeleni ine,
Lesa wandi, Lesa wandi, pokeleni ine,
Mwi shina lya kwa Yesu Kristu,
Mfumu yandi, Mwine luse, pokeleni ine.

4. Lesa wandi, Lesa wandi, bakisheni ine,
Lesa wandi, Lesa wandi, bakisheni ine
Mwi shina lya kwa Yesu Kristu,
Mbakisheni ku fya bubi, mbakisheni ine.

title: LESA EKACEMA WANDI
lyrics:
1. Lesa ekacema wandi,
Nshakabile pe,
Ku mulemfwe alentwala,
Ku menshi ya bumi.

2. Umutima ambwesesha,
Mu Iwendo angafwa,
Mu nshila sha bololoke,
Pe shina lyakwe fye.

3. 'Lintu nkenda mu mfwa ine
Nshakatine kantu,
Pantu Imwe mulensuiga.
No kunsansamusha.

4. 'Cintamba mwanungikila.
Mu cinso ca babi,
Umutwe wandi mwansuba,
'Nkombo shaisula.

5. Busuma bweka no luse,
Fyakulankonka pe,
Na mu ng'anda ya kwa Lesa,
Nkekalililamo.

title: MFUMU YA LUSE KACEMA
lyrics:
1. 'Mfumu ya luse Kacema,
Musuma, talendaba;
Te 'ti nkabile, andema
No ko ndi e ko aba.

2. Ku menshi ya mweo na ko
Amtwala alanwensha;
Na ku mulemfwe wabako
Andisha no kunyesha.

3. Naluba fye no kuucla;
Amfwayafwaya 'nsanga,
Anango luse, ambula,
Ku mushi ayayanga.

4. Nshitina ku mfifi ya mfwa,
Mwe Mfumu mwe babako,
Nkonto yenu ilenjafwa;
Mulembalikilako.

5. Mwantebete ifyacila,
No luse mwalufima;
Mwaleko kwango kwashila
Kwisusha umutima.

6. Ku cikuku muncitia,
'Busuma bwafulisha;
Ku mwenu ko nkamwimbila,
Mwe Mfumu, mwandubula.

title: IMFUMU YESU KRISTU
lyrics:
1. Mwise mutote
Mwe ba busumino,
Iseni ku mwine ku Betlehemu;
Tuye tumone
Mwine wa ku mulu.
Mwise tumutotele.

Mwise tumutotele
Mwise tumutotele, Kristu 'Mfumu.

2. Lesa wa bumi,
'Mwine wa lubuto,
Uyo wafyalilwe mu Betlehemu;
Tata mo Mwana,
No buteko bonse;
Mwise tumutotela.

3. Toteni bonse,
Mwe bali mu mulu,
Yangileni lelo mu Betlehemu:
Mulumbanyeni,
E mwine wa fyonse;
Mwise tumutotele.

4. Mwe mfumu nomba
Ifwe twamuposha,
Imwe mwafyalilwe mu Betlehemu;
Nimwana Lesa
Aishilyo muntu;
Mwise tumutotele.

title: UMFWENU BALEAULA
lyrics:
1. Ufwenin baleaula,
Katula aisa;
'Mitima yonse imbile
'Kumupokelela.

2. Aisa kakula babi,
'Bakakwa na Ciwa,
'Fikakulo aputula,
Na fyonse fya fyela.

3. Aisa fuma ku mulu,
Kubomba mu calo;
Na pa menso ya shampofu
Abiko lubuto.

4. Aisa ndapa'balaswa,
'Bali no bulanda;
No bupe bwakwe cikuku,
Apela bapina.

5. Malumbo yesu Shikulu
yamucelele pe
Ne ng'omba shonse mu mulu
Shimwimbile shonse.

title: SHISENI, MWE IMMANUEL
lyrics:
1. Shiseni, mwe Immanuel,
Mwise lubula Israel,
Ku bunkole alelosha
Asuke 'se Mwana Lesa.

Anga! Anga! Immanuel,
Aleisa, we Israel.

2. 'Seni, Nkonto ya kwa Yesa,
Iseni, benu mutashe;
Batuleni ku Gehena,
Bacimfye imfwa ne Ciwa.

3. Shiseni, mwe Kasuba,
Tabutusheni mitima;
Ikumbi 'li litamfiwe,
No bushiku bwa mfwa bupwe.

4. Shiseni, mwe Lufungulo,
Mutwiswileko ku mulu;
Muwamishe mu nshila ine,
Ya ku bucushi mushile.

5. Shiseni, mwe Mfumu Nkulu,
Mwe bapele 'bantu benu
'Mafunde yene pa Sinai,
Mu kutinya no mucinshi.

title: UMFWENI ABA KU MULU
lyrics:
1. Umfweni aba ku mulu
Balelumbanye Mfumu;
Ilelo yatufwalilwa
Ukutuwikishanya.
Imemi mwe bena fyalo,
Ne ndimi imbeni nasho'
Atufyalilwa, Kristu,
Mu mushi Betlehemu.

Umfwenya ba ku mulu,
Balelumbanye Mfumu.

2. Mukankala Kristu Mfumu,
Bamulumba ku mulu;
Ali Lesa wa bapalwa,
Ku mushimbe afyalwa;
Aba ni Lesa mu buntu,
Aba fye mumtu munensu;
Posheni Mfumu nkulu
Yesu, Lesa mu bantu.

3. Ya mu mulu, ya mutende,
Yalungama, ya cine;
Ukutemwa ne fya luse
Yaletela fye bonse;
Yasho mucinshi wa m'mulu
Tube fwe abatuntulu,
Tube no mweo wa pe,
Tupalane no Mwine.

4. Mwe Bafwaikwa ku bantu,
Mwikale kuno mwesu,
Ni mwe Mwana wa Mushimbe,
Mutwanshishe ifibi,
Twimbe nabwa balubulwa;
Imfumu yatufyaliwa,
Ululumbi mu mulu,
No mutende pa bantu.

title: BAKAKUMBA BAPEMPWILE
lyrics:
1. Bakakumba bapempwile
Mpanga ubushiku;
Umungeli aikile,
'Lulumbi lwa mulu.

2. "Mwilatina," asoseshe
Abali no mwenso,
"Namuletels fye bonse
"Ilandwe lya nseko."

3. "Mu mushi wa kwa Dabidi,
"Afyalilwe lelo,
"Mfumu Kristu, Mupusushi:
"E bulangililo;"

4. "Mwana munono wa mu mulu
Mulemusangamo;
Alemoneka ku bantu,
Ali mu mukondo."

5. Efyo wa sosa wa ntanshi,
Elyo lyamoneka,
Ibumba lya bangeli,
Balumbanye Lesa:

6. "Ululumbi kuli Lesa,
Mutende mu calo,
Fya busuma fyatendeka
Nomba no kupwa yo.

title: LYAISHILE UBUSHIKU
lyrics:
1. Lyaishile ubushiku,
Ilandwe lya kale,
Lyafumine kubangeli
Abasoso kuti:
"Mutende ube mu calo
Ufume ku mulu,
Bantunse babe tondolo,
Bomfwe abangeli."

2. Ku fyabipa ne fya bulwi
'Bantunse bacula,
Imyaka yapite ingi
Lya fyabipisha.
Abelelwa te ba kumfwa
Ulwimbo lwa luse;
Shitataleni mwe bantu,
Mumfwe abangeli.

3. Mwe bafininwa ku fibi,
Mwe basakamikwa,
Mwe baleenda bulendo
Lubomba lubomba.
Inukeni! nshita ipya
Yaiso lubilo;
Tusheni muno mu nshila
Mumfwe abangeli.

4. Moneni nshinku shaisa,
Ishalesoselwa
Na kasesema wa kale,
Inshiku shawama.
Elyo mutende ukesa
Fika konse konse;
Ne fyalo fyonse fikemba
'Lwimbo lwa bangeli.

title: NI MU MUSHI WA KWA DABIDI
lyrics:
1. Ni mu mushi wa kwa Dabidi
Mwali tanga lya ngoma,
Umo nyina abikile
Umwana mu mulimba.
Ni Mariya e nyina;
Yesu Kristu e mwana.

2. Aikele pano panshi,
Uli Mfumu ya bonse;
Ng'anda yakwe yali tanga
No busanshi mulimba,
ku bapina afyelwe,
Uyo e Mupusushi.

3. Aumfwilw kuli nyina
Pa kukulo yo Mwana;
Amutemwa 'sakamana
No mucinshi wayana.
Nomba bana bapale
Ulya mwana wa kale.

4. Nomba talimo mwi tanga
Umo ngombe shilala;
Lelo ali kuli ifwe,
Na mu mulu mwa Lesa.
Ifwe tumupashanye
Nelyo tube baice.

title: AKAMUSHI BETLEHEME
lyrics:
1. Akamushi Betlehemu
Akali tondolo,
Abana bonse ba bantu
Basendamo tulo.
Nangwi mfifi ya bushiku
yali pano panshi,
 Uyo waiso lubuto
Abo Mupusushi.

2. Kuli Mariya afyalilwe
Yesu Kristu, 'Mfumu;
Na bangeli balonene
Lumbula ku mulu.
Mwe ntanda shonse sha mu mulu
Shimikileniko,
'Lulumbi lube kwa Lesa,
'Mutende mu calo.

3. Kanshi ubupe icalo
Capelwa na Lesa;
Nabo bwaisa tondolo
'Kwabulo kukafya.
Ifyo fine na ku bantu
Lesa apele pe;
Ubwa cine ne cikuku
Muli 'fwe fikale.

4. We Mwana wa mushilo, we
Wa mu Betlehemu,
Wise wikale muli 'fwe,
Ufumyo lubembu.
Twaumfwo lwimbo ku mulu
Lwe landwe lisuma;
mwise kuli 'fwe mwe Mfumu
Mwikale Katula.

title: KULI IFWE AFYALILWA
lyrics:
1. Kuli ifwe afyalilwe
Uwa Busubilo,
Ba mu mulu batotela
Ne bantu mu calo,
Ba mu mulu batotela
Na bantu mu calo

2. Uwa Mutende e shina,
Afuma ku mulu,
Wa finjelengwe, Wa maka,
Wa bonse ni Mfumu;
Wa finjelengwe, Wa maka,
Wa bonse ni Mfumu.

3. Amaka teti yakapwe,
Akalabateka
No bololoke mu mulu,
Mutende mu calo;
No bololoke mu mulu,
Mutende mu calo.

4. Kuli ifwe afyalilwe
Uwa Basubilo,
Wa finjelengwe, Wa maka
Aisa mu calo,
Wa finjelengwe, Wa maka
Aisa mu calo.

title: OWE , NSEKO ! IMFUMWI YI!
lyrics:
1. Owe, nseko! Imfumyi yi!
Natumusengele;
Abantu bamutotele,
Ba panonse bembe.

2. Owe, nseko! Mupusushi!
Abantu bembile;
Ifintu fyonse ifya mweo
Fisanswilisheko.

3. Owe, nseko! Aleteka!
Ne cine, cikuku;
Abena fyalo beshibe
Ukutemwa kwakwe.

title: MONENI MU MULIMBA
lyrics:
1. Moneni mu mulimba!
Kana katufyalilwa;
Kalayenwe kale fye,
Katupusushe bonse,

Ubushiku bwapalwa!
Bwaco bwa cilubula;
Kristu Yesu Imfumu
Afyalwa mu Betle'mu.

2. E mwali mu mulimba!
wabumbile ne ntanda;
E Mfumu yacindama,
E waisa tuwamya.

3. Soseni mwe bacemi,
Muli na mashiwi nshi?
Cinshi mwashe mpange fi,
No kwisa fye mu mushi?

4. Ubushiku tumwene
Ulubuto lwa nkombe,
Shileimbile Mfumu,
Yafyalwa mu Betle'mu.

5. Mwana Lesa washila
Ukutemwa kwakula!
Mwafumine ku mwenu
Ku kutula fwe bantu.

6. Mufundishe na ifwe,
Tupalane na imwe
Tube 'ba kuicefya,
Ba luse, abafuka.

title: IFYO BANTU BA KALE
lyrics:
1. Ifyo bantu ba kale
Ulutanda bamwene,
Ilyo balucelele
Lwaleya, lwabalike;
Ifyo, fine, mwe mfumu,
Tutwalwe na ku mulu.

2. Ifyo baya no kwanga,
Kuli imwe ku ng'anda,
Ku kumufukamina,
Untu baletotela;
Ifyo fine, mwe Mfumu,
Tumufwaye ku mulu.

3. Ifyo bantu baoele
'Bupyo bwingi bwafina;
No kwanga, ifyo fine
Tumupele fya bupe,
Kuli imwe, mwe Mfumu,
'Mupusushi, Shikulu.

4. Yesu Kristu nshiku pe
Mu lwendo mutubake:
Fya mu calo nga fyapwa,
Mutufishe pa numa
Apashili lutanda
Lwa kutungulula.

5. 'Calo cilya ku mulu,
Tabafwaya lubuto;
Ni'mwe kasuba uko;
Tukembila mu mulu
Aleluya ku Mfumu.

title: NANI ULYA MWI TANGA
lyrics:
1. Nani ulya mwi tanga
'bantu baletotela?

Ni Mfumu, 'Landwe lisuma
Mfumu mwine walulumbi;
Tumuwile pa nkasa,
Bonse bamutotele.

2. Nani ulya acula
Ali eka mu mpanga?

3. Nani ulya batemwa
Wa mashiwi ya luse?

4. Nani ulya ondapa
Balwele na bacula?

5. Nani ulya mu mfifi
Apepa kuli Wishi?

6. Nani ulya ku muti
Atufwila fwe babi?

7. Nani ulya ku nshishi
Wafuma? Mupusushi!

8. Nani wa pa cipuna
'Calo conse ateka?

title: MWASHO BUFUMU
lyrics:
1. Mwasho bufumu 
kumwenu ku mulu,
Pa kwishila ine pano,
Na ku Betlehemu
Takwali ne ng'anda
yakuti muye fyalwamo:
Mwise mu mutima, 'Mfumu,
E mo mube pe mu mwenu.

2. 'Nkombe shashila
Shalimwimbeli,
Shacindike, mwe Katula:
Mwise mu mutima, 'Mfumu,
E mo mube pe mu mwenu.

3. 'Nama sha calo,
Ne fyuni pamo,
Fyakwete apa kwikala;
Na kristu Yesu,
Mwana -Lesa M'kulu,
takwetw nelyo ni ng'anda;
Mwise mu mutima, 'Mfumu,
E mo mube pe mu mwenu.

4. Atuletele
Landwe lisuma;
Lya kulubula ababi;
Lelo bamupata,
Bamufwike myunga,
Bamutanike pa muti;
Mwise mu mutima, 'Mfumu,
Ine ku muti ndetemwa.

5. Mwalibwelele
Ku bukankala,
No mulu wamucindike,
Nomba muletwita
Ku mwenu ku mulu
Uko mwe mwatangila:
Mwe mfumu twaumfwo bwite,
Ine ifwe eko tuleya.

title: LYA KUTEMWO KUCILA
lyrics:
1. Lya kutemwo kucila
Ili shina lyabila;
Kwi shina lya kwa Yesu
Twinike 'mitwe yesu.

2. Yesu 'shina lyashiila
Ku baluba mu nshila;
Na ku bantu bacula
Wene e ukatula.

3. Yesu 'shina lyawama
'Lya waisatulama;
Waisa mu bucushi
Abe fi Mupusushi.

4. Yesu, lishina lyeka
Mu mashina yaseka,
Ilyo lyatulula
Ku bubi ubwakula.

5. Yesu! e lya kutemwa,
Umo buntu bwalemwa;
Yesu! e lyo lyawama,
Emo tulebelama.

title: LULUMBI NO MUCINSHI
lyrics:
1. 'Lulumbi no mucinshi
Fyeba kuli imwe,
Abaice ne ndimi
'Hosana' balemba

2. Ni mwe Mfumu ya Israel,
'Mwana wa kwa Lesa,
Mwishina lyakwa mwine
'Mfumu itotolwe.

3. Ibumba lya bangeli
Balemulumbanya,
Na bantu ba panonse
'Hosana' baasuka.

4. Abantu ba ba Yuda
Bamutangilile;
Twaisa mulumbanya,
Twapepa kuli 'mwe.

5. Na mu kucula kwenu
Balimulumbanye;
Nomba mwaimishiwa
Twacite fyo fine.

6. Na imwe mwapokele
'Malumbanyo yabo;
Na nomba kuli ifwe
Mubulya mapep.

title: LINTU NAKUTUMANINA
lyrics:
1. 'Lintu nakutumanina
Mu bupalo bwenu,
Fyansekesha pakalamba,
Nafilwo kutasha.

2. Ilyo nali umwaice
Mu nshila shayafya,
Mwalengafwilisha lyonse;
Nangwi ilyo nshishibe.

3. Ilyo nalwele ubwa mfwa
Elyo mwamposeshe;
Ilintu namubifishe,
Mwalinjelele fye.

4. Pa makana na makana
Ya bupe, natota;
Nabupoka no kutasha,
Nakulatotela.

5. Mu nshita shonse sha mweo
Nakulamukonka;
Na kulya kwine ku mwenu
Nkalamulumbanya.

6. Mu nshita sha ciyayaya,
Nakulamwimbila;
Awe nshita shacepesha,
'Kumulumbanisha.

title: ISO KO NDI, WANAKA
lyrics:
1. "Iso ko ndi, wanaka,
Ndekupo butusho."
E shiwi lya kwa Yesu
Ku bakungumana.
Lyatwebe fye mutende,
'Cikuku ne nseko,
No luse, e na fyonse
Ifishakapweko.

2. "Iso ko ndi, we mwana,
Ndekupo lubuto."
E shiwi lya kwa Yesu
'Lyaisa ne nseko,
'Mitima yalifina,
Twaluba mu nshila;
'Bushiku natulosha,
Bwaca twasekela.

3. "Iso ko ndi, we wafwa
Nalakupo mweo."
E shiwi lya kwa Yesu,
'Lyaisa twafwako;
'Mulwani alikosa,
Lelo watupa maka,
Ne fwe tukayansha.

4. "Na uyo walaisa,
Teti mutamfye 'yo."
E shiwi lya kwa Yesu,
Ilitamfyo mwenso,
Litetwita fwe babi,
Fwe bashiwaminwa,
Uluse lukalamba,
Tufike kuli 'mwe.

title: ISO WANAKA
lyrics:
1. Iso Wanaka,
Uletusha,
We wa bulanda
Sansamuka,
Iwe waluba,
Mona ng'anda;
Yesu e ninga
Ne cibusa.

2. Musao obe,
Iso tushe,
E bumi bobe
No mutende;
E shila nsuma,
Ne cilambu;
E mo bashila
Bashuka.

3. Nga naicena
Anjikata;
Nga naikusha,
Alemfunda;
Nga namupusa,
Alensanga;
E wantemwisha,
E Katula.

4. Ndemusubila
Ndemulumba
Ndemucindika,
Ndemutasha;
Imbe ne wenu
Inshiku pe
Ne mwe Shikulu,
Mwine bupe.

title: SHIWI LYAIKALA
lyrics:
1. Shiwi lyaikala,
Litutungula;
Untu asumina,
'Nseko alepelwa.

2. Nga babi baliko,
Ltupo buseko;
Litusansamusha,
Liletupususha.

3. 'Lyo bulanda bwisa,
Na ifwe twatunkwa,
Liletufundisha,
Litubakilila.

4. Uwishibe nani,
Ubuseko bwe shiwi,
Buntu tulepelwa,
Fwe balesumina?

5. 'Fwe kuti twishibe
Fyonse litufundusha,
Kuti tumutemwe,
No kwikala nemwe.

6. Ishiwi lya luse
Lyafwa aba mweo;
Ishiwi lya mweo
Lyafwa abalefwa.

title: MWE CILIBWE CA KALE
lyrics:
1. Mwe Cilibwe ca kale
Kamfisame muli mwe;
Umulopa na menshi
Fyasumine kuli 'mwe,
E kundapwa kwa fibi,
Nsagululwe, muntule.

2. Nelyo kamo nshikwete,
'Lupanda njikata fye;
Mumfwike ndi ni bwamba,
Ngafwe ne mbulwa maka,
Nomba njise, nimbipa,
Munsabe nikesa fwa.

3. Te kubomba kwandi yo,
Kwinganwamya nge lambo;
Ne lyo naba no mute,
No kulile nshiku pe;
Fyonse tafilubula,
Ni mwe Mweka mutula.

4. 'Lintu nkaleko mweo
Yakashibata menso;
No kuyo ko nshishibe,
Pa cipuna mumone;
Mwe Cilibwe ca kale
Kamfisame muli mwe.

title: LESA WESU ATEMENWE CALO
lyrics:
Lesa wesu atemenwe calo;
Atumine, atumine Yesu,
Kutufwila, kutufwila fwe babi.
Aimine, aimine ku mfwa.
Aile, aile ku mulu.
Alebeta, alebeta ababi.
Uyu Yesu, uyu Yesu ni Mfumu
Ya ku mulu, ya ku mulu na panshi
Tusumine, tusumin Yesu.
Atupele. atupele ubumi.

title: YESU, 'YU MWANA LESA, YESU
lyrics:
1. Yesu, 'yu Mwana Lesa, Yesu,
'Mulop twasambwa, ifwe,
Mwikale ne fwe, 'mpulumushi shonse
Tupose, Yesu Kristu

2. Lesa Tata, Yesu Mwana wenu
Afwililya bantu bonse,
Tumulumbanye, Yesu e katula,
Wa maka yonse, no luse.

3. 'Mfumu yesu, tuli mu mfifi fye,
Pa kutemwe fya mu calo
Twaliluba fye, mutukkule
Mu minyololo, tuli basha.

4. Mu mafunde, Yesu atupele,
Ati: "senda Landwe lyandi
"Mu calo conse, ndemupa maka
Kubwesha bonse, kuli ine.

title: SHINA LYA YESU BUSUMA
lyrics:
1. Shina lya Yesu busuma
Ku ba basumino!
Lilefumya ubulanda,
No kutamfyo mwenso.

2. Lileposha abalanda,
Nabo abacula,
Fyakulya ku abansala
Na bo abanaka.

3. 'Libwe lyandya po nakula,
Ni nkwela ya maka,
'Cibikilo icafusha
'Bwingi bwa cikuku.

4. Yesu ni Kakumba wandi,
Ni Mfumu Katula,
Mwine wandi, mweo wandi;
Mubulya mapepo.

5. 'Mutima wandi ushipe,
No luse lwicepa;
Lelo lintu namumona
Nakulamupepa.

6. Nsuke nshimike fya luse
No mweo na maka;
Ne nyimbo she shina lyenu
Shintekyo mutima.

title: MWE LESA, MWE LUSE LWINE
lyrics:
1. Mwe Lesa, mwe luse lwine
Mufumine mu mulu,
Tube ng'anda shenu shine
Mubemo butuntulu.

2. Yesu, ni mwe ba cikuku,
Kutemwa kwine kwine,
Mwiselima mu cituku,
Mumenshemo 'fya cine.

3. Mwe ba maka ku kutula,
Ikaleni muli 'fwe,
No mweo wenu wakula
Ulekusha na ifwe.

4. Tube 'benu ababomba,
Nga bashila mu mulu;
Tumutashe, mwe bafumba
No bukata bukulu.

5. Lengeni fwe, mwe kutemwa,
'Bantu bapya bashila;
Bana benu abalemwa,
Bene bene balila.

6. Tube ne mwe mu bukata,
'Bana benu kwi sano,
'Ba mitime yaikata
ku cikuku na mano.

title: NI KACEMA WESU
lyrics:
1. Ni kacema wesu
Yesu Kristu
Mu maboko yakwe,
Tukatina nshi?
Tuye tumukonke,
Aletangila,
Nangu ku mulandu,
Nelyo ku nika.

2. Yesu ni kacema,
'Lintu asosa,
Amashiwi yakwe
Yatusekesha.
Nelya kalipila
Aba no luse
Atutungulula
Fwe mpanga shakwe.

3. Yesu ni kacema,
Atufwilile,
'Kuti atusambe
Atupushushe,
Atulemba bonse
Ne shina lyakwe;
Ati, "Abantemwa
"Bali banandi."

4. Yesu ni kacema,
Atusunga pe,
Ababi ne ciwa
Te kutwipaya.
Nga twapalamine
Mfifi ya imfwa,
Teti tukatine,
Tukansha ne mfwa.

title: YESU E KAAFWA WESU
lyrics:
1. Yesu e kaafwa wesu,
Ulubembu asenda,
Cisuma tutwale fyonse
Kwa Lesa mu kupepa.
Nanga ifwe twayanshiwa,
Twikatisho kulombo;
Nangu tulecula-cula,
Tupepe mu mitima.

2. Bushe tuli no kweshiwa?
Bushe, tulecula pe?
Ifyo fine twinenuka,
Kuli Yesu tulombe.
Kaafwa umbi takuli
Wa mpofu no wa luse,
Yesu atwishiba bonse.
E calenga tupepe,

3. Nga twanaka no kufinwa,
No kumfwisho buali,
Yesu e katula wesu,
Mu mapepo tumwebe.
Ilyo fibusa fyatusaha,
Yesu takatushe yo.
Mu maboko atubaka,
Tukasango butusho.

title: ISHIWI LYA MFUMU LILETI
lyrics:
1. Ishiwi lya Mfumu lileti, we fumye cili mu linso lyobe
Panuma walamona bwino mu linso lys mubiyo.

We munyina, we munyina, we fumye cili mu linso
Panuma walamona bwino mu linso lys mubiyo.

2. We kafinya balefumya cakutobola mu linso lyobe
Lyene walamona bwino mu linso lys mubiyo.

3. Lingikeninmitima yenu ku muntu umo na umo
Mwalaba icakumwenako nabo basumine.

4. Busumino ubwakweyeka ku mubiyo tabwilila
Tufumye ifyabipa fyesu elyo basumine.

title: WE LUNKUBWA LWA FYUMA
lyrics:
1. We lunkumbwa lwa fyuma (nobe) watwala bengi mu fibi
Imicitile yabo (yonse) yapalana fye ne Ciwa.

We lunkumbwa (nobe) watwala bengi (mu fibi)
nobe we ulebembwa (nafyo) ukapingulwa

2. Fwe balumendo na bakashana natucenjele ne fyuma,
Alepoke fyuma 'babi bakapingulwa nafyo,

(Kutota mapi)
3. Tupose fyonse tuli nafyo, lunkumbwa no bukowesho
Nga tukabe fubusa fyakwe, tukapwano mweo.

4. Ananiya, Geashi (bene) e batemenwe fyuma,
Lunkumbwa no bupupu (bwabo) e fyabatwele ku mfwa.

(Kutota mapi)
5. Ulu lwimbo twaimba (lelo) lukaba ni nte yesu,
Mwe baleibe fyuma fya bene mukapingulwa nafyo.

(Umuku wantashi, Kwimba no kutota; umuku wa cibili, belatota, kwimba fye te kutota.)

title: YESU ATUTEMWA BONSE
lyrics:
1. Yesu atutemwa bonse,
Atemwa pe
'Nshiku shonse aba nefwe
Atemwa pe.
Yesu aletungulula,
Na mu nshila tukaluba
Nga tayulepalamina
Atemwa pe.

2. Yesu atupelo bumi,
Atemwa pe.
Mu mitima twamutemwa,
Atemwa pe.
Atusamba no mulopa,
Aletulanga mashiwi
Ya kwa Lesa Umupashi,
Atemwa pe.

3. Alefumya mpulumushi.
Atemwa pe.
Atutwala na ku mulu,
Atemwa pe.
Akulatwafwa na maka,
Atucincintilile mfwam
Na balwanya ba mu nshila,
Atemwa pe.

title: KULI KAPILI ‘KUTALI
lyrics:
1. Kuli kapili ‘kutali
Ku musumba ku nse,
Uko Kristu atanikwe,
Atule few bonse.

2. Te’ti twishibe ‘fikali
Ifyo aumfwili;
Twasubila ni pali ‘few
We ne aculile.

3. Atufwilile few babi,
Tube abawama;
Tufike ukwaikala
Basambwa, basaama.

4. Takwali umbi musuma
Wa kutufutila;
Aisulako ku mulu,
Alanga nshila.

5. Atutemwesha few bonse
Tuletetekela;
Tumutemweshe na ifwe,
No kumubombela.

title: PA KULOLESHA LUPANDA
lyrics:
1. Pa kulolesha lupanda
Uko Mfumu yamfwilile,
‘Fyuma fyandi kanshi fya fye,
Ne cilumba na co capwa.

2. ‘Mfumu indeshe mu fibi,
Nseke mufwa ya kwa Yesu;
Fyonse fya fye fintu ntemwa
Ndeposa pa mulopa wenu.

3. Ku nkasa, maboko, mutwe,
Mone fya luse fyafuma,
Tafyakumene na kale,
‘Luse ulu no bulanda.

4. Nkwata conse ‘ca na ‘calo
Nga cabe cice cakupa;
Lwakulo luse e pamo ne palo
Umweo wandi ndemupa.

title: WA KUCULA ISHINA
lyrics:
1. Wa kucula ishina
Lya Mwana wa kwa Lesa,
Alubwilya babipa,
Aleluya, Mupusushi!

2. ‘Bantu bamusoweke,
Amfwilile ne mubi,
‘Mulopa wansumine,
Aleluya, Mupusushi!

3. Twabipilwa, twabipa
Wene e wa kaele,
Bushe apwo kutula?
Aleluya, Mupusushi!

4. Aimikwe ku kufwa,
Akutile “Nacipwa,”
Mu mulu nomba ‘fika
Aleluya, Mupusushi!

5. Ikese Mfumu Yesu,
‘Kututwala ku mwesu,
Tukembila mu mulu,
Aleluya, Mupusushi!

title: ‘CINE YESU ANCULILE
lyrics:
1. ‘Cine Yesu anculile,
‘Mfumu yamfwilile;
‘Mfumu wakwe walashilwa
Ine muntu mubi.

2. Ni pa bupulumushi bwandi
Atetele Kale;
Ku lupanda Kwamoneke
Ubwingi bwa luse.

3. ‘Lintu Kristu e Katula
Afwililya bantu,
Kasuba takamoneke,
Takabalike yo.

4. ‘Filamba fyandi fyacepa
Ubupe ku Mfumu;
Kuli imwe ndeipela,
Eco ndecita fye.

title: MWE BANTU TALALENI
lyrics:
1. Lekenyo kulanda,
Moneni Mfumu yenu
Ili pa lupanda
Amenso yakwe kale
Yamulolekeshe
No kumutemwa bonse
Mwe bantu iseni

2. Mwitina kupalama
Ku Mfumu ya mweo
Ili mu kufwa nomba
Pa mulandu wenu.
Nangu aleculisha
Atemwo kumona
Abantu mu kupepa,
Balemwibukisha.

3. Mwe bantu palameni
Fukameni bonse
No kutotele Mfumu
Pa kutemwa uku
Mumupele mitima
Tusumine nomba
Ukumukonka lyonse,
Inshiku shonse pe.

title: EE BULANDA
lyrics:
1. Ee bulanda!
Ifilamba fyandi
Fipone pa makasa ya Mfumu

2. Ee bulanda!
Mfumu munjelele
Ne wa mpulumushi napapata.

3. Ee bulanda!
Ifyo mwanculile!
Bubi bwandi e bwamucushishe.

4. Ee bulanda!
Filamba fyafula
Umwenso wanjikata, ntuleni.

5. Ee bulanda!
Ishiwi ndeufwa
“Tata mubelele tabeshibe.”

6. Ee Kutemwa,
Kwa kwa Lesa wesu,
Kwasokoloka mu lupanda lu!

title: OWE, OWE MWE BANTU UMFWENI SHIWI
lyrics:
1. Owe, owe mwe bantu umfweni shiwi
Elya soswe lelo lyafika mu mitima
Lolekesha pa lupanda, mone Mfumu.

2. Owe, owe Kanshi ni pali ine
Mfumu yandi yaculile, yamfwilile
Pa bubi ubo ncita, ubo ncita.

3. Owe, owe filamba fyaisula menso
Ndelila pa nkasa sha kwa Yesu,
Andubwile ne mubi, ndi mubi cine

4. Owe, owe tekuti twishibishe
Uyu mulandu wakwa Yesu wakwa uwacita,
No luse no kutemwa pali ifwe

5. We katula, Mulubushi, naisa kuli iwe,
Unjibukishe lintu uli mu bufuma,
Napapata we Mwana wakwa Lesa.

title: YESU BALIMUSULILE
lyrics:
1. Yesu, balimusulile,
'Mfumu ya ku Galili
Mwaculile, tupusuke,
Ni mwe mwatulubwile,
Mwe Katula wa bucushi,
Mwasende nsoni shesu,
Muli imwe twalishuka.
'Shina lyenu lya mweo.

2. E lambo Lesa 'lisonta,
Fibi fyesu kusenda,
Luse e Iwamutumine,
Lwa kutuwikishanya.
'Bantu benu baelelwa.
Mulandu wa mulopa.
Icipata caisulwa
Kuti bonse bengile.

3. Yesu muli mu lulumbi
Ukwikalilila pe;
Abatulwa bamutasha,
Ku cipuna kwa Shifwe
Uko muletulombela,
E cifulo twapelwa.
Pe fye muletupepela
Tusuke tukafike.

4. 'Mucinshi lulumbya maka,
Fya kulinga tupele;
Amalumbo yashakapwe,
Yatwamino kuleta;
Mutwafwe, mwe ba kutulwa
Ne nyimbo shawamisha;
Twimbile Umupusushi,
Tulumbanye 'Manyule.

title: YESU NI KU KALFALI
lyrics:
1. Yesu ni ku Kalfali
Ndefwayo kwikala,
Kuti njishibe fyonse
Ifya luse Iwenu.

Kalfali, Kalfali,
E ku mutima wandi,
Ine nsangweko pe,
E ku mweo wandi.

2. Eko atula babi,
Bamonako bumi;
Eko balesekela.
No bumi bapelwa.

3. Pa kwisa kwa kwa Kristu
Eko tukasangwe,
Na mu mulu mwa Lesa
Kalfali tukemba.

title: TULETASHO WATUFWILA
BALONGANA ‘BABUFI BAPANGANA ‘KUMUTANIKA
lyrics:
1. Balongana ‘babufi bapangana ‘kumutanika;
Bamutanike Yesu apabulo mulandu wakwe.

Moneni ‘Mwana: moneni ‘Mwana,
Waibela ‘wa kwa Lesa
Atanikwa.

2. Mwe natutontonkanye ‘mitemenwe ya kwa katula!
Imfwa ilya yali yesu, ukuti tube no mweo.

3. Pa capindama aibulilile emfwa ya bantu nse;
Cilubula cesu twalubukilamo ku Mulwani.

4. Fyali fyakutulofya ifyaponene pali Yesu;
Ca cine kwali kushipa kwakwe kwalengele atufwile.

5. Muli wene icebo ca kutemwa casokoloka;
Tuli nankwe nomba, e katula uwatulwilile.

6. Bushe katula wa musango uyu tamulabe
Mwa?
Cine tutemwe Yesu, ifwe pana tulemutemwa.

title: MONA UMWANA WA MPANGA
lyrics:
1. Mona Umwana wampanga
Alesenda ulubembu lwesu lonse.

Mwana wa mpanga
Watusendela ulubembu lwesu lonse.

2. Asendelyo mubili wakwe
Tasosele nelyo kamo pa lupanda.

3. Pa lupanda lolekesha
No kumona ifyo wenya tuculule.

4. Umfwikisha umusowa
Untu wene atuculile few bantu.

5. Mu mulopa wakwe wine
Emo ulubembu lwesu lulesambwa.

title: PALYA PA LUPANDA MWE YESU AMFWILE
lyrics:
1. Palya pa lupanda mwe Yesu amfwile
Pa mutwe pali ngala, ngala ya myunga
Alilile ‘Eloi mwe Lesa mwe,
Lama sabakatani cinshi mwanshila.

2. Ku ninga e ku ninga Yesu abuka
Alicinfya imfwa mwe lelo mutende
Ndesekala Shikulu abuka mwe
Sekeleni bonse mwe Yesu wa bumi.

3. Pa kunina ku mulu Yesu atile,
Loleleni Mupashi mulelomba pe
M’pashi wa mushilo wise pali ‘mwe
Kumwafwa imwe bonse kuti mukose

4. Soseni ku fubusa na ku ba lupwa
Na ku mitundu yonse ikasekela,
Mwitina ncito iyi ya mucinshi
Nshita yenu ikesa ilyo m’katemwa.

title: KATULA WANDI WATUNGULULWA
lyrics:
1. Katula wandi watungululwa
Kwati ni mpanga, bubi bwandi.

2. Alipepele mu Getsemane
Bushiku bonse, bubi bwandi.

3. Katula wandi alitanikwe
Asumya m’lopa, bubi bwandi.

4. Alimfwilile pa capindama
Alishikilwe, bubi bwandi.

5. Alibushuwe mulya mu nshinshi
Acimfya imfwa, bubi bwandi.

6. Alimine kuya ku mulu
Kumpapatila, bubi bwandi.

7. Katula umo mu calo conse
Wakumpususha, bubi bwandi.

title: KRISTU NASHUKUKE LELO
lyrics:
1. Kristu nashukuke lelo,
Acindikwe Shikulu!
E kasuba ka mushilo:
Acindikwe Shikulu!
Santulweni ulwimbo,
Acindikwe Shikulu!
Mwe ba panshi na ba m’muli,
Acindikwe Shikulu!

2. Nomba tumwimbile nyimbo,
Kristu Mfumu ya mu mulu;
Aculile pa bubi,
Alubula ifwe babi.

3. Imfwa yakwa ya bukali
Yafutila bonse Kale;
E wa mweo, wa maka
Aletula no kubaka.

4. Tucindeke Lesa Mkulu
Lumbeni mwe ba mu mulu;
Ba cikuku, ba luse,
Tata, Mwana, no Mupashi.

title: YESU ALIYAIMA
lyrics:
1. Yesu aliyaima;
Imfwa teti itutinye,
Ine nimba njishiba
Ku mfwa Yesa akanjita.
Aleluya!

2. Yesu aliyaima;
Pa cipuna aikala;
Nalakonko ko aba,
Pama nankwe ku kwikala.
Aleluya!

3. Yesu aliyaima;
Na wene alimfwilile,
Nakulamubombela,
No kumulumbanya pepe.
Aleluya!

4. Yesu aliyaima;
Pantu luse lwafulisha,
Umweo ne mfwa naya,
Teti fitupasukanye.
Aleluya!

5. Yesu aliyaima;
Teti ntine nelyo kamo,
Imfwa nomba e mwinshi
Wa kwingilila ku mweo.
Aleluya!

title: KULWA KWAPWA NO KUCULA
lyrics:
1. Kulwa kwapwa no kuculo,
Mpalume yesu yalyansha,
Na bangeli balumbanye;
Aleluya!

2. Amaka ya mfwa yafilwa,
Pantu Kristu ayonaula,
Kubyo kupunda kwashila.
Aleluya!

3. Nshiku shitatu shapita,
Aimo Mumi ku bafwa,
Alumbwe ku ciyayaya,
Aleluya!

4. Afune fyela fye kumbo,
Aponya yonse mulando,
Embilwe pe ne sho nyimbo.
Aleluya!

5. Mwe Mfumu mwaliculishe,
Ku mfwa mwalitufumishe,
Twikale natumwimbile.
Aleluya!

title: MWE BANA INSANSA.
lyrics:
1. Mwe bana insansa
Bulanda nabupwisha,
Mutanikwe wesu
Nasangwe mumi Lelo.

Kristu uwafwile
Nga tatutubwike bwa fye
Busumino besu,
Cine Kristu aliima.

2. Fya mfifi fyalipwa
Twaenda mu lubuto,
Kristu naanshe mfwe
Buseko bwesu bwafulisha.

title: MU NSHISHI ALELE
lyrics:
1. Mu nshinshi allele,
Yesu katula,
‘Kulindilo kuca,
‘fumu yandi,

Mu nshinshi alima,
Ayanshisha balwani bonse
Alima katula kututulako,
Nomba pa cipuna
Aba na Lesa;
Alima, alima
Aleluya, alima.

2. Kwa fye balindile
Yesu Katula,
Kwa fye bafungile
‘Mfumu yandi.

3. ‘Mfwa tayamwikete,
Yesu katula;
Wene ayanshishe,
‘Mfumu yandi.

title: OWE! UKWIMA KULIPO
lyrics:
1. Owe! Ukwima kulipo,
Ne nseko, mutende;
Owe! Ilibwe tapali,
Ininga ili fye.

Yesu emine, ‘fyasosa,
Emine mu mfwa ye lindi,
Sekela, imbila ukwima,
Yesu emine Mupusushi.

2. He, he! Insalu sha mufwe
Nashifungwa bwino
He, he! Ininga ili fye,
Yesu e talipo.

3. Yangu! Aenda panonse,
Nomba talecula;
Yangu! Ululumbi lwakwe,
Konse lwalumbuka.

4. Mona! Kulipo Ukwima,
Ne shiwi ne nyimbo;
Mona! Kwaleta ubupe,
Ukwansha kwa Mfumu.

title: YESU WENE AKATEKA
lyrics:
1. Yesu wene akateka
Konsha kasuba katula;
‘Bufumu teti bukapwe.
‘Myaka isuke ikapwe.

2. Bakalamupepa bonse,
Bakalamulumbanya pa;
‘Shina lyakwe lyatemwikaw,
Ubushiku na kasuba.

3. Abantu ba ndimi shonse
Bamutemwe, bamwimbile;
Abana na bakalmba
Bakalalombo bupalo.

4. Abatekwa bakashuka,
Bafungwa bakafungulwa,
Abanaka bakatusah,
Aba nsala bakekuta.

5. Mulete bonse, mwe bantu,
Mucinshi luse ku Mfumu,
Bangeli beke no kwimba
Pamo na ba muno calo.

title: TUCELELE IMFUMU
lyrics:
1. Tucelele imfumu
‘Mwana wa kwa Lesa;
Yafumine ku mulu,
Pa calo kuteka.
Aisa ono busha,
Kukakula nkole,
‘Kufumye fyabipisha,
‘Kutela mu cine.

2. Akesa fya nge mfula
Iloka pa calo,
Buseko no kutemwa
E fikamenamo,
‘Kutangilie ntashi
Mutende uleya;
No bololoke bwine
Pa numa bwakonka.

3. Shikamuwile mfumu
Shikaleto bupe
Ndupwa shikatotela
Shikamwimbila pe
Pantu akalateka
Mu fyalo ne fyalo;
Konse ukwe fipele
Fingapupukila.

4. Bonse bakamupepe
Nshiku ne nshiku pe,
Bufumu bukakula,
Te kuti bukapwe,
Awe tacakaaluke
Cipingo cakwe ci;
Likalabelela
Ishina lya luse.

title: YESU PE FYE MWABAPO,
lyrics:
1. Yesu pe fye mwabapo
Kakumba musuma;
‘Shina lyenu lyabila,
Mu mitima yesu.

2. Twalitemwa na kale,
Twalitontonkanya;
Na muno bukalamba
Twalilitemwisha.

3. ‘Lingi ku bonaushi,
Nga twafikileko,
Amubula ‘ba ne few,
Mwe katula wesu

4. Ilingi na mu mfifi,
Nga twaliwilemo,
Lelo mwalitwimiishe,
E mwatupiseshe.

5. Mwe kakumba musuma,
Twamucetekela
Ni mwe ba mulatulisha
Mutwimya nga twawa.

6. ‘Shiwi lyenu lwa maka
Mu mfwa tukalyumfwa,
Mukatufishe bonse
Kwi cinka kumyenu.

title: YESU PE FYE MWABAPO,
lyrics:
1. Apwe penga lya kwa Lesa likomfwikwa mu cala,
Apo bukaca bwa lubuto tu tu,
Apo abasalwa bakaya longana pe shilya
Apwekete na mashina, nkabeko.

Apwakete na mashina,
Apwakete na mashina,
Apwakete na mashina,
Apwakete na mashina nkabeko

2. Ubushiku bwa kutinya apwa bafwa bakema,
No kumono bukankala bwa kwa Kristu;
Apo abasalwa bakaya longana kwa Lesa,
Apwakete na mashina nkabeko.

3. Aleni tulebombela Shikullwifwe nshiku pe,
Tuye landa ku bantu ifya mweo,
Nge milimo yapwa, ne few twaya mu calo cilia,
Apwakete na mashina nkabeko.

title: MUFWIKE NGALA KRISTU MFUMU!
lyrics:
1. Mufwike ngala Kristu Mfumu!
‘Mikulo yinse ilumbanye;
Lulumbyu, mucinshi kwi shina,
Nomba ne nshiku pe.

Fwe tukamucite Mfumu;
Mu calo cilia ca lulumbi!
Akabe Mfumu yesu pe,
Tukamulumbanya.

2. Muceleleni mwe bangeli,
Mu masese ne nyimbo shonse,
‘Bena fyalo baleyawile
Mfumu ya sha Mfumu.

3. Ni kacimfya acimfyo bubi;
Mupashi ateko mutima.
Mwi shina lyakwe tukanshya pe;
‘Mfumu ya pen a pe.

title: UWAFWIKILWE IMYUNGA
lyrics:
1. Uwafwikilwe imyunga
Nomba alumbukwa,
Citebo cakwe cisuma
Ci;emusamika,

2. 'Cifolo cakwe ku mulu
Cili cakwe ceka,
'Mfumu ya sha Mfumu shonse,
'Lubuto ulwa pe.

3. 'Buseko bwa ba mu mulu,
Na ba panshi pamo,
'Luse lwakwe baishiba,
Ishina batemwa.

4. Lupanda lwakwe lwa nsoni,
'Cikuku caluko,
Lwabaletelo mutende
Ne nseko sha mweo.

5. Baculile Mfumu panshi,
Mu mulu bateka,
Ebo capelwo kwishiba
'Kutemwa kwakwe pe.

6. 'Lupanda kuli fwe bumi,
Ni mfwa kuli Yesu,
'Bucetekelobwa bantu,
'Landwelyabo lya pe.

title: LINTU YESU ASHALIKYA
lyrics:
1. 'Lintu Yesu ashalikya
'Bananganga bakwe,
kasansamusha apele
'Kuba ne fwe.

2. Aishile tusangula
'Kuba ba cikuku;
Afwaya-fwaye mitima
Mwa kwikala.

3. Ishiwi lyakwe twaumfwa,
Liletepelesha,
Lyaleshe fibi, lyatwebe
Fya kwa Lesa.

4. 'Cikuku cintu twakwata,
'Kwansha kwesu konse,
Ne fisuma fyamitima,
Fili fyakwe.

5. Mwe, Mupashi wa bupe,
Ifwe natuwila,
Mwikale muli 'fwe benu,
Mu mitima.

title: MWISE, MUPASHI BULESA
lyrics:
1. Mwise, Mupashi bu Lesa
Iseni na maka;
Mube ne fwe mu ngande yi,
Fwe bantu banaka.

2. Mwise, Lubuto lwa, 'mulu,
Tumone 'fye cine;
Twende mu nshila ya mweo,
Umwaendo Mwine.

3. Mwise, Mulilo waoca,
Fipye fibi fyesu;
Tube capelwe cashila
Kwi shina lya Yesu.

4. Mwise, mwe Mume wabomfya,
Kuli 'fwe bauma,
Mumeshe no kufulisha
Fitwalo fisuma.

5. Mwise, mwe Nkunda yatemwa,
No luse lwenu 'lu;
Bafwane 'benu ba panshi,
Nge fyo ba ku mulu.

6. Mwise, mwe Mwela wakuka,
Tube bapimpisha;
Na bana bonse ba bantu,
Babe abomfwisha.

7. Mwise, Mupashi wa mweo,
Wa cikuku conse;
Yesu alangwe ku bantu,
Babe 'bakwe bonse.

title: MWE MUPU BULESA
lyrics:
1. Mwe Mupu bulesa,
Iseni mupite,
Ntemwe pe fyo mwatemwa;
Munjimye, nkacite.

2. Mwe Mupu bulesa,
Puteni pali ne,
Nkacule ne mwe, washipa,
Washila, wa cine.

3. Mwe Mupu bulesa,
Mwise no kwingila;
Imbe no mweo wacisha,
'Mulilo washila.

4. Mwe Mupu bulesa,
Nga mwaputa ine,
Nkaba no mweo ushipwa,
kwa Lesa wa cine.

title: MWE MUPASHI WA KWA LESA
lyrics:
1. Mwe Mupashi wa kwa Lesa,
Mu bwingi bwa bupe bwenu,
Konshe kwa bantu baenda
Mwikile palya baluba.

2. Peleni ndimi sha maka
Sha kusose shiwi lyenu,
No bupalu bwa ku mulu,
Konsho kwe landwe lyumfwikwa.

3. 'Mfifi 'sangukyoubuto,
No bulwi bubyo mutende,
'Bafilwa mubapya maka,
No luse lwansho bukali.

4. Mwe Mupashi, balungikwe
'Bantu bonse kuli Lesa;
Umweo mubapemene,
'Kuti basumine bonse.

5. Ulupanda lubacimfye,
Kabese babatishiwe,
'shina lyakwe lilumbulwe;
Abantu balitotele.

6. Lesa Shifwe alefwaya,
"Bantu bonse bapusuke;
'Kutemwa kwakwe kucitwe
'Kuti yesu abe Mfumu.

title: UMUPASHI WA LUSE
MWISE, TULI SHAMPOFU
lyrics:
1. Mwise, tuli shampofu,
Tupelwe ulubuto,
Umupashi wa mulu,
Kasansamusha.

2. Tuli babi, tusambwe;
Twalwala, mutuposhe;
Twaluba, tulondolwe;
Kasansamusha.

3. Twashiwa ababusu,
Tupelwe fya ku mulu,
'Luse, nseko, cikuku,
Kasansamusha.

4. Umutende ngo mume,
Wise utunashe fwe,
Fya kwa kristu tuangwe
Kasansamusha.

5. Mutupepele bonse,
Lumbuleni kwa Shifwe
'Kukabilisha kwine,
Kasansamusha.

6. Twishibe bwino Tata,
Tumfwishe mu mitima,
Ifyo twasangululwa,
Kasansamusha.

7. Tuletwe kuli Lesa
Mi nshila yawamishi,
Ku mulu tukasendwa,
Kasansamusha.

title: YESU M'TUME M'PASHI
lyrics:
1. Yesu m'tume M'pashi,
Esefunda bantu bonse.

2. Ifwe tulelila;
Muleba ne fwe no luse

3. Mwakak Israel;
Bakeni ne fwe fwe benu.

4. Yesu m'tumyo m'lilo;
Ifibi fyonse ufyoce

5. kacema wa bantu,
Cemeni ne bumba lyenu

6. Mwana Lesa M'sumu,
Ni mwe Mfumu ku mutima.

7. Tulemutotela,
Tulecindika no kwanga.

title: CILONGANINO CABA
lyrics:
1. Cilonganino caba
Pali Yesu Kristu,
Cane cilengo cipya
Ca shiwi na menshi
Aishile cifwaya,
Ukuba nabwinga,
Cashitwa no mulopa,
Alicifwilile.

2. Baitwa bena fyalo
Ku kufyalwa cipya,
'Bucetekelo bumo
Ne mfumu imo fye;
Citashe shina limo
Cilyo cimo cilya,
Ubusubuli bumo
Ebo cakwatisha.

3. Mu ncito no bulanda,
Pamo na mu bulwi;
Cilindilo mutende
Uwa ciyayaya;
'Lintu ifya lulumbi
Fikesa moneka,
Elyo cilonganino
Kuti calatusha.

4. Calumdana panonse
Na Lesa patatu,
Cilomfwana na balya
Abaletusho 'ko,
Mwe banga, mwe bashila!
Mwe Mfumu tupeni
Pamo nabwa bafuke
Tukekale nemwe.

title: MWE LESA WA KU BETELE
lyrics:
1. Mwe Lesa wa ku Betele
Mwe batulisha pe,
Ni mwe mwaletungulula
Bantu benu kale.

2. Tulefukama Kuli 'mwe,
No kumupapata,
Mwe Lesa wa kwa Abramu
Mube Lesa wesu

3. Mu nshiku shenu sha mweo,
Tutungululeni,
Mwakulatupele filyo
Tufwukwe kuli 'mwe.

4. Mutubake twapapata
Shisuke ndo shipwe,
kabinge mulya mwa Shifwe,
Tukabelelela.

5. Ubu bupalo twalomba
Ebo twafwaisha,
Efyo mukaba, mwe Lesa
Wesu wa pe na pe.

title: CIFULO TWATEMWA
lyrics:
1. Cifulo twatemwa,
Ica bucindamo,
'Nseko emo shaba
Shacila sha calo.

2. Ing'anda twatemwa,
Umwa kulongana,
Umo nemwe mwaba,
Emo tukumana.

3. 'Mashiwi twatemwa,
Ya mweo, mutende,
Yatusansamusha,
Yatusekesha pe.

4. Ukwimba twatemwa,
Pa bupe bukulu,
Lelo twafuluka
Ukwimba ku mulu.

5. Yesu twamutemwa,
Tupelwe cikuku,
Ca kumutemwisha
kuno na ku mulu.

title: BATATA, BATATA TULI PANO
lyrics:
1. Batata, batata tuli pano
Apo tulelumbanya Imwe.

2. Twalomba, twalomba mucipale
Ici cilonganino caafya.

3. Natumfwa, natumfwa ukulila
Kwa bantu 'babulo kwishiba.

4. Balenda, balenda na mu nshila
Shintu shaya ku bnaushi.

5. Mukoshe, mukoshe 'bantu benu
Kuti babe ni nkombe shenu.

6. Mutume, mutume ba kusosa,
Bashime landwe lisuma.

7. 'Bufumu, 'Bufumu bwenu bwise
No lubilo mu calo conse.

title: LESA MU NGANDE YI
lyrics:
1. Lesa mu ngandeyi,
Tata wa maka
Pa makasa yenu twalongana,
Ifwe twatotela
Lesa wamushilo
Pa bufuke, luse bwenu,
Tulumbe, mu nyimbo
Pa bupususho bu
Lesa mu ngandeyi.

2. Kristu mu ngandeyi
Ifwe mwi shiwi,
Fwe ba nsansa twasubila
Ku bubi tutulwe.
Bulanda, cikonko
Fyaba lubuto, ninsansa,
Tulumbe, mu nyimbo
Fikakilo fyaya
Kristu mu ngande yi.

3. Ng'anda iyi yenu,
Mwe wa Shila mwe
Mitima yesu e ng'anda,
Ikalenimo pe!
Milimo icitwe,
Ukufwaya kwenu kwise.
Tulumbe , mu nyimbo
Na kwi pele-pele
Tumubombele pe.

title: 'KACELO PE 'LUSE LUPYA
lyrics:
1. 'Kacelo pe 'luse lupya
Lutushibusha, lutwimya,
Lutupususha mu mfifi,
Lutubwekesha ku bumi.

2. Uluse lupya nshiku pe,
Luba mupepi na ifwe;
Lututula, lutwelela,
Lufundishe fya kwa Lesa.

3. Tulumbanye Mfumu yesu
Mu ncito shenu she lelo
Emo twikanye fyabipa,
Tupalame kuli Lesa.

4. Mutwenshe mu luse lwenu
Mutufishe na ku mulu,
Mutwafwe kuti twikale
Mu luse lwenu nshiku pe.

title: YESU E PO MUBE
lyrics:
1. Yesu e po mube
Maka ya mweo,
Ukupepa kube
Ukwa mushilo.

2. Puteni Mupashi
Ube na bonse;
Bulande fumyeni
Mu m'tima onse

3. Efyo tukendesha
Pa lwendo ulu,
Tukalalolelo
Kuca mu mulu.

title: MWI SHINA LYA KWA YESU
lyrics:
1. Mwi shina lya kwa Yesu, Mwe Tata,
Natulongana, tulepapata;
Mube no luse, tuli bapumbwa,
Namumfwe nyimbo sha kumulumba.

2. Mwe batusakamana nshike pe,
Ku luse lwenu mupe fya bupe;
Mwe batucita pe 'fye bukata,
Ku minwe yenu muletwikata.

3. Na ifwe twaba bafye, twaluba,
Ububi bwine bwaisabuba
Tuli fye no bulanda, mwe Tata,

4. Mwi shina lya kwa Yesu 'mwapaka,
Mu luse lwenu lwine lwa ntaka,
Mu m'lopo waitilwe pali fwe,
Twiswileniko nomba mwe Shifwe.

title: MWE LESA WANDI, MUBE NA INE
BWA LELO BWAPWA, MWE KABUMBA
lyrics:
1. Bwalelo lelo bwapwa, mwe kabumba:
Kwishiwi lwenu bwaila;
Ku kuca kwena twamulumba,
Tutashe pa kusaila.

2. Ibumba lyenu lilolela
Pa kuye calo ku kuca,
Mu fyalo e limubombela,
Lilola fye talitusha.

3. Ilyo ku calo na ku bemba,
Lucelo lwaya ku ntashi,
Lyaime shiwi-elya bemba,
Lya bamupepa pe panshi.

4. Kasuba e katuwila,
Kabusha bantu kwi samba;
Baima na bo, bamwamgila,
'Milimo yenu batamba.

5. Mwe Lesa mwaba Mfumu ine,
'Bufumu bwenu tabupwa;
Bukula pe mu basubile
Ku sha nko shone ne ndupwa.

title: AKASUBA KAWA
lyrics:
1. Akasuba kawa,
Nomba bwaila;
'Milimo naipwa,
'Bantu batusha.

2. Nomba kuli mfifi,
'Ntanda shabeka,
Inama ne fyuni
Filesandema.

3. 'Banaka bapelwo
Tulo tusuma;
No bupalo bwenu
Tuleshibata.

4. Mupele abana
Bamumone 'mwe;
Mutule bacoba
Ba pa cambeshi.

5. Mutekye balwele
Abakalipwa;
Abacite fibi
Mulebelela.

6. No bushiku buno
'Bangeli bene
Batubaka bwino,
Batupempula.

7. Ngo bushiku bwaca
Mukanjimye'mwe,
'Mutima wabuta,
Mpalana ne mwe.

8. Tulumbanye Lesa,
Wishi na Mwane,
Mupashi Mushilo,
Nshiku shonse pe.

title: NI MWE KASUBA KA MWEO
lyrics:
1. Ni mwe kasuba ka mweo,
Tebushiku nga mulipo;
Ikumbi limo liisa
Ku menso ku kumufisa.

2. 'Lintu nalala mu tulo,
No kushibata amenso,
Amatontonkanyo yaba
Ya kuli 'mwe, Mupusushi.

3. Mube na ine 'kacelo
Tapali 'mwe te kwikala,
Mube na ine bwaile,
Tapali 'mwe natine mfwa.

4. Nga umocwa bana benu,
Naulungana ilelo,
MweMfumu mulombe nomba,
Wene mu fibi elala.

5. Abalwele mubalinde,
Na mapalo ya kuli 'mwe;
'Bakulosho bushiku bu
Balale bwino mu tulo.

6. Mukatupaya 'kacelo,
Tatulaenda mu calo,
Tukasuke tukafike
Ku mulu, mu luse lwenu.

title: MUTUFUMYE NO BUPALO
lyrics:
1. Mutufumye no bupalo
Mu mitima yese pe;
Tube no kutemwa kweni,
Twange mu luse lwenu;
Mutukoshe, mutukoshe,
Pwendela panonse.

2. No mucinshi twatotela
Pa mashiwi yasuma;
Yabe fyakulya fya mweo,
Yekale mu mitima;
'Cinso cenu, 'cinso cenu
Cibe ne fwe nshiku pe.

3. Elyo lintu twapalama
No kufuma mu calo,
Ni ku mulu tukasendwa,
Tunakile ne nseko;
Tukekala, tukekala,
Na Yesu ishiku pe.

title: LESA WANDI NATOTELA
lyrics:
1. Lesa wandi natotela
Mapalo yonse napelwa;
Munteke bwino bushiku
Ntushe mu kuboko kwenu.

2. Munjelele Mfumu yandi
Fyonse fyabipa nincite;
Kaba mu calo, na Imwe
Pa kulala mbyo mutende.

3. Tulumbanye Lesa wesu
E mutula palo lyesu,
'Ba mu calo, 'ba mu mulu
Lumbeni Lesa patatu.

title: MWE MFUMU TWALETA BANA
KATULA AISA KANA
lyrics:
1. Katula aisa kana,
Lesa wamaka lishina;
Baisatota bangeli
Kwati fye mwana alele.

2. Uwatendeka ku bunya
Ukulangd Lesa sana,
Aleti mu mulu mwe,
'Abana bese kuli ne!

3. Natuleta aba bana,
Kuli 'mwe mu ng'anda yenu
Ku Mupashi mubatishe,
Ku luse lwenu mubishe.

4. Nkombe shenu shibabake,
Bende mutende mu nshila,
Mubake kasunga wabo,
Mubalembe na mashina.

5. Mwe bomfya bwino ku bana
Malumbo yenu yayana,
Lekeni nu tu tutashe
Shifwe, Mwana, no Mupashi.

title: BULENI UBWIKASHI
lyrics:
1. Buleni ubwikashi,
Mupelwe no bu bwine;
Utushita ne nshiku,
'Kuti mulumbanyemo.

2. Buleni amaboko,
Kamubombele nayo;
'Makaso kuti yabe
ya lubilo kuli 'mwe.

3. Buleni shiwi lyandi,
'Kuti mwimbile imwe,
'Milomo kuti ibe,
Na mashiwi kuli 'mwe.

4. Buleni fyuma fyandi
Teti mukaninine;
Bulenya maka mano,
Kamubombele nayo.

5. Buleni mifwayile,
Nomba taili yandi,
'Mutima ube wenu,
Kuti mwikalemo pe.

6. Bulenyu luse ulu,
Lintu mwampa mwe Mfumu;
Mumbule ime wine
'Kuti mbe wenu wa pe.

title: MWE TATA MUBASUMINISHE BEMININE PA NTANSHI YENU
lyrics:
1. Mwe tata mubasuminishe beminine pa ntanshi yenu,
Sumineni bapokeleleni, sumineni babe benu mu cine.

2. Mwe Yesu aba bantu benu, Mwafwile pa kubalubula
Benu lelo, umfweni baleti twabika Imwe mu mitima yesu.

3. Na imwe Mupashi washila, 'seni nomba mwikale nabo,
Bafweni ukwenda bwino, umutende wisule mu mitima yabo,

4. Bacite milimo isuma, bapeleni bonse amaka,
'Kuti bende mubulungami basuke bafike kuli 'mwe ku mulu,

5. Mwe tata mutashiwe, na Imwe Yesu, Mulubushi wesu,
Na imwe Mupashi mu basangulule Lesa umo fye acindikwe.

title: NI KUNO TWAMONANA, MWE MFUMU
NSHAWAMINA, MWE MFUMU YANDI
lyrics:
1. Nshawamina, mwe Mfumu yandi,
Mwingile mu mwandi,
Soseni shiwi limo line,
Limposhe ne mubi.

2. Nshawamina, nangu cimo
'Mutima walyuma,
Mwikale shani muli 'ne?
Soseni ndepola.

3. Nshawamina, mwe Lesa wandi
Namukanya shani?
Mwandubwile no mulopa,
Ukuti mpusuke.

4. Mwise ndisha pa mulalilo,
Icilyo ca Mfumu;
Mumpelyo kutemwa na maka,
Mukushe no mweo.

title: KRISTU E WATULUBULA
lyrics:
1. Kristu e watulubula'
E o tuleibulula;
Tulanga ne mfwa yalula,
Asuke 'se.

2. 'Mubuli watutobelwe
Mu cilyo cino wapelwa;
Ku luse lwakwe tulelwa;
Asuke 'se.

3. No mulopa baitila,
Pa muti apwatufwila,
Umwangashi watwilwila,
Asuke 'se.

4. Ukucula kwakwe kale,
Pamo no kubwela kwakwe
Fyalundwa ne cintu ici
Asuke 'se.

5. Lisuke penga lyumfwikwe,
Ne filindi fikasuke,
Ne shiwi likulu ili:
Akabwela.

6. Ukusubila kusuma!
Twiikala na bulanda,
Tulinde no kusumina
Asuke 'se.

title: KU CINTAMBA CA MFUMU
lyrics:
1. Ku cintamba ca Mfumu,
Tulye fyakula fwesu
Fya mukate wa mulu.

2. Twafukama kili 'mwe,
Tumfwe fyo mulya pepi,
Luse lwenu tutashe!

3. Twabebeto lupanda,
Twaikatwo bulanda,
Pa fyabipa twacita,

4. Tufimpule mwangashi
Fwe bonse twibikishe
'Mulopa wasumine.

5. Fibi mutukakula,
'Busumino bufule,
Umutende mutupe.

6. Mututugulule pe
Tukasukya tufika
No kwikala ma Imwe.

title: NI KATULA, PA MFWA YAKWE
lyrics:
Ni katula, pa mfwa yakwe, abulile umukate ati,
Ndemupela, ndemupela umubili, umubili wandi
Mwe buleni, mwe buleni umukate, umukate, mulye
Ibukisha, ibukisha, ukutemwa, ukutemwa, kwandi
Abulile, abulile, ulukomba, ulukombo, ati
E mulopa, e mulopa wasumine, wasumine imwe.
Ilayano, ilayano, lyafishiwa, lyafishiwa, lelo
Imfwa yandi, imfwa yandi, ndemufwila, ndemufwila, bonse
Kukufumya, kukufumya, ulubemba, ulubembu, lwenu.
Mulecita, mulecita kwibukisha, kwibukisha Ine.

title: YESU NI NTULO YA NSANSA
lyrics:
1. Yesu nintulo ya nsansa
Ntulo ya mweo, lubuto
Fwe batemwe shina lyenu
Twapilibuka ku calo

2. 'Cine cenu ca pe na pe,
Mwatula bonse 'bamwita;
Ku bamusanga, ba luse,
Ku bamufwaya, Musuma.

3. Twasonda mwe, mwe Fyakulya,
Twafwayo kulye nshiku pe;
Twanwa, mwe kafukauka,
'Cilaka naciputuka.

4. 'Mitima yamufuluka,
Konse uko twaikala;
Twaanga nga twamumona,
Twashuka nga twamwikata.

5. Mwe Lesa mube ne fwe pe,
Inshita shibyo mutende;
Mutanfye mfifi ya fibi,
'Lubuto mubengeshimye.

title: APO NDEILINGULULA 'NDI MUBEMBU
TULI PANO PA MULALILO
lyrics:
1. Tuli pano pa mulalilo,
Yesu aleti munjibukishe.

2. Alaile abantu bakwe,
Citeni ici munjibukishe.

3. Acili ne fwe no kusosa,
Citeni ici munjibukishe.

4. Alebeba ba busumino,
Citeni ici munjibukishe.

5. Pa kupoko mukate uyu,
Citeni ici munjibukishe.

6. Pa kupoko lukombo ulu,
Citeni ici munjibukishe.

7. Filekosho busumino,
Citeni ici munjibukishe.

title: MWE LUSE LUTUNTULU NO LWA BUPE
lyrics:
1. Mwe Luse lutuntulu no lwa bupe,
Twainamo ko muli, tutila,
Lekeni batemwane inshiku pe
Abo mwapo bumo ubwashila.

2. Mwe Mweo wine, shibamwishibishe,
Babe no luse, basubilane;
Mubafwe bapame, bashipikishe,
Ku mweo, ku mfwa kwine, bafwane.

3. Mubape nsseko 'shiwamyo kucula,
Mupe no mutende uleteka;
Babe no lubuto lwakwa katula,
No mweo ku mwene ukwabeka.

title: MWE BA SHIFWE, KALENGA
lyrics:
1. Mwe ba Shifwe, Kalenga,
Mano, luse, maka,
Mu Edene mwaufya,
Mwi bala mwabaka;
Ku bwinga buno mwise,
Mulete ;fya bupe,-
Babe fye no mutende
No kutemwana pe.

2. Mwe Yesu mwafumbile
Ku bwinga ku kana,
E po mube, mupale,
Abaleupana;
Ku musamwe bamwene
Musanshe no wenu,
Pa kusonda beshibe
E ca bupe cenu.

3. Mwe Mupashi wa cine,
Wa luse, washila,
Mwise mubaponene,
Mulekukutila;
Mufunde no kuwamya,
Baleba bafuka;
Muteke no kubensha,
Baleba bashuka.

4. Abakula apafye, Tata,
Bashaba na Imwe;
Yesu tapala ng'anda,
Tamwaba aba musamwe;
Ababo mo muli mwe,
Takuli cingona;
Uluse no mutende
E fyo bakamona.

title: ABAFWA BASHUKA
lyrics:
1. Abafwa basuka
Nga bali kwa Yesu,
Balakile mitwe
Pa cifuba cakwe.

2. Kulya kwawamisha,
'Mfifi tailiko;
Ni Yesu bamona,
Bamutemwa uko.

3. Ifyabacushishe,
Fya muno mu calo,
Nomba fyapwa fyonse,
Tafibacusha 'yo.

4. Kakumba musuma
Atungululako;
Kushili bulanda,
Kuli fye inseko.

5. Twailile filamba,
Fwe bashiwa pano,
Twabalosha cibi,
Tulefulukako.

6. Ishiwi ne nseko,
No kutemwa kwakwe,
Fwe bonse ba pano
Nomba teti tumfwe.

7. Munenst we, waya
Twalikutemwisha;
Twakulila nomba,
Yesu alilile.

8. Bwangu bukesa ca,
Ishiwi tukomfwa,
Kuli 'fwe akati:
"Bukeni, angeni."

title: PAMO NA SHIKULU!
lyrics:
1. Pamo na Shikulu!
Ye, efyo nacibe:
E mweo wine ku mulu,
Ku bakwe beshibe.
Mu caloe mo ndi,
Ngo mweni ndelila
Lelo ndosha menso yandi
Ku mwesu kwashila.

2. Ku ng'anda kwa Tata,
Kwacishe fya panshi!
Ndelola fye ku cipata,
Ku mushi ku ntanshi.
Nabo wafuluka
Icalo nalumba,
Apa kwikala babuka,
'Bashila ba bumba.

3. Pamo na Shikulu!
Ye, Tata, mwasosa,
Ne shiwi 'li lituntulu
Kabili lyakosa,
Mwikale na ine,
Te kuti mfilule;
Mulendema, njise nine;
Mulelwa muntule.

4. Nga nkaleko mweo,
Nkapula mukati,
Pa kufwa ninshi mfyuke mfwa,
'Mweo naya sanga,
Lyene nkeshibisha,
Yangwe! 'fyo natemwa
Ishiwi 'li kusosa pe;
"Pe fye kuli Lesa!"

5. 'Kulile shiwi 'li,
Kwe penga lya mpela,
Kumfwikwa konse ku nshishi;
"Pe fye kuli Lesa!"
Lishiwi lya kwima,
Kupenda kwa kucimfya
Kabili, "Pe fye kwa Lesa!"
Amen, 'fyo fine.

title: MILIMO MUKUSHE
lyrics:
1. 'Milimo mukushe,
Mube ne fwe bonse;
Ku maka yenu mosose,
Bomfwe aba bantu.

'Milimo mukushe,
Iseni twalomba;
Pano twafuluka Imwe
Mwise, mu tu pale.

2. 'Milimo mukushe
Mulumbuke konse,
'Kutemwa kwenu kube pe
Mu mitima yesu.

3. 'Milimo mukushe,
Mupalya mashiwi;
Ne citetekelo naco
Cikule muli 'fwe.

4. 'Milimo mukushe,
Balapilya bengi;
'Shina lyenu lilumbuke,
Mutupale bonse.

title: SHINGANGA ALI MUPEPI
lyrics:
1. Shinganga ali mupepi
'Shina lyakwe ni Yesu;
Atubelele uluse,
Umfwe shiwi ni Yesu.

Bulaulwimbo lusuma,
Lwe shian lya kwa Yesu,
'Shina ili lyacila;
Yesu, Mfumu Yesu.

2. Lubembu lwesu lwasambwa
Mwi shina lya kwa Yesu
Umwe wakwe mwapelwa
Musuku mube nankwe.

3. Lyafumye fibivno mwenso,
Ishina lya kwa Yesu;
Natemwa shina lya Mfumu,
Natemwe mfumu Yesu.

4. Twimbe bonse tutashe mwe
Ishina lya Yesu;
Tusubile Mbila yakwe,
'Mbila ye pusukilo.

5. Inga twafika ku mulu
Tukamumona Yesu,
Tukamwimbilo lwimbo lu
Lwe shina lya kwa Yesu.

title: NDEFWAYA IMWE PE
lyrics:
1. Ndefwaya Imwe pe,
Mwise twende;
Musose fye, mumpe
Umutende.

Ndefwaya mwe batula!
Ni mwe fye nkabila;
Mumpale ne wacula,
Namwishila.

2. Ndefwaya Imwe pe,
Mube m'pepi;
Ifibi fyanshiwe,
Uko muli.

3. Ndefwaya Imwe pe,
Ku kucula;
Mwiseikala pe,
No kuntila.

4. Ndefwaya Imwe pe,
Mumfundishe;
Ne fyunu fya cine
Nkafifishe.

5. Ndefwaya Imwe pe,
Mwe bashil;
Njaluke wenu pe
Uwabila.

title: CINTU CAKUTUSUNGUSHA
lyrics:
1. Cintu cakutusungusha,
Ica kupapusha nganshi,
Mwana Lesa aishile
Ukwisa fwilo mwaice.

2. Ninjishibe fyo ca cine;
Asalilyo kuicefya,
Aculishe, alifwile
Pantu mwine antemwisha.

3. Njishibe fyo engantemwa
'Ne mwaice mukakashi;
'Kutemwa kwakwe kwakula
Imfwi lyo kuti mutemwe.

4. Ca kupap pakwishiba
'Kutemwa kwakwe kwa cine
Lelo kupapo kucila
Apo mutemwa panini.

5. Kamutemwishe, mwe mfumu
Kamwimbile mu mutima,
Nakulaya ndamutemwa,
Nsuke mumone 'fyo mwaba.

title: SEKELELENI! KALUBULA 'ISA
ISHIWI NDEUMFWA
lyrics:
1. Ishiwi ndeumfwa;
Lyanjita kuli 'mwe,
Ukunsamba no mulopa
Untu mwansumine.

Yesu ndeisa,
'Kwisa kuli mwe
Munsambe no mulopa
Untu mwansumine.

2. Nangula ndi mubi,
Yesu antemwisha,
Alefumya ulubembu
Alempela maka

3. Yesu alemfwaya,
Mu kutemwa kwakwe,
Ne subilo alempela
'Luse no mutende.

4. Yesu alempela
'Maka mu mutima,
Ne cikuku alentula,
Amfumya mu fibi.

5. Yesu amfwilile,
Pantu nabipalwa,
Alemfwaya 'musubile
Mu mutima wandi.

title: MWE UMFWENI IMBIA NSUMA
lyrics:
1. Mwe umfweni imbila nsuma.
Kale twalya baluba;
Yesu afumine ku mulu,
Cine atupuswishe.

Na ni uwatupuswishe?
Cine cine mwana-Lesa!
Musango nshi? Atanikwe!
Ni kwi aya? Ni ku mulu!
Ekwa letupapatila.

2. Takwali umbi Kutufwila,
Nelya bamalaika;
Uwatanikwe pa lupanda,
E Mwana wa kwa Lesa.

3. Iso subile muntu ali,
No kumufukamina;
Elyo ukomfwo luse lwakwe,
Cine akakutula.

title: BONSE NATULUMBE LESU WESU
lyrics:
1. Bonse natulumbe Lesa wesu
'Luse atubelela;
Tumutemwe pantu atutemwa,
'Buku lyakwe lyatweba.

Yesu mwine, aishile
Kuno twaba fwe bantu;
Ukufwayo kupususha
Fwe bonse balubile.

2. Bonse fwaisheni Lesa wesu,
Pantu akulatwafwa;
Calilembwa Lesa aleumfwa
Bonse balepalama.

3. Bonse subileni Lesa wesu,
Emo tuleshukila;
Alefwaya tumucetekele,
Iyi nshila isuma.

title: MWE KATULA MWINCILILA
lyrics:
1. Mwe katula mwincilila,
Ndemupapata,
Ilyo muleita bambi,
Mwilancilila.

Yesu, Yesu,
Mumfwe ndekuta,
Ilyo muleita bambi,
mwilancilila,

2. Kampalame kuli Imwe,
Mpele uluse,
Kamfukame no bufuke,
Nsangyo mutende.

3. Mubusuma bwenu bweka
Ncetekela pe,
Ku poshiwa mu mutima
E cabupa fye.

4. Nimwe mweo ne cimwemwe,
Nimwe cikuku;
Umbi panshi nshimumwene,
nangu mu mulu.

title: NOMBO KWISHIBA NAISHIBA
lyrics:
1. Nombo kwishiba naishiba,
Yesu antula, alemposha;
Amfumya mu mfifi, na ku mfwa;
Ni ku mutima, ankosha ndi.

Ndi ne cimwemwe, ndesamwa pe,
Ndetasha Yesu, Mfumu yandi,
Ndi ne cimwemwe, ndesamwa pe,
Ndetasha Yesu, Mfumu yandi.

2. Ndi ne cimwemwe, ndesaminwa
Ifyacindama fya kwa Lesa:
Ku m'tima wandi kwamoneka
'Maka ya Mfumu, no kutemwa.

3. Nombo mutima watalala:
Yesu na ine, bucibusa,
Ndemubombela, ndelolela;
Na pakwikala akampela.

title: ONSE UTEMENWE! BOMFWE BONSE
MWISE KWA YESU, MWIKOKOLA
lyrics:
1. Mwise kwa Yesu, mwikokola,
Ku mbila kwamoneke nshila;
Ali mupepi, aleita,
Aleti, "Iseni."

Tukasamwa pa kumonana,
Nga twasambwa twaba bashila;
Tukekala ne mwe, Ka tula,
Ku mwesu nshiku pe.

2. Mumunakile uwatile,
"Abana bese kuli Ine"
Aleni Yesu tumutemwe.
Mwikokola, seni.

3. Tontonkanyeni e po ali,
Ishiwi lyakwe shiumfweni,
Aleti, "Imwe bana bandi,
Mwikokola. 'seni"

title: KULYU BWITE BULEFUMA KWI SHILYA
lyrics:
1. Kulyu bwite bulefuma kwi shilya,
'Leteni ulubuto,'
Kulya bantu ba kuya pokolola,
'Leteni ulubuto.'

Ulubuto lwa mbila nsuma
Lubalikile konse,
Ulubuto lwa mbila nsuma
Lubalike pe na pe.

2. Ili shiwi lya ku Makedoniya;
'Leteni ulubuto,'
Fya bupe fyesu twakulatambika,
'Leteni ulubuto.'

3. Icikuku ca kwa Yesu cice pe
Tutume ulubuto,
Ne mibeleya kwa Yesu twishibe,
Tutume ulubuto.

4. Twinenuna mu kubombe milimo,
Tutume ulubuto,
Tulonganya ba kwingila kwa Yesu,
Tutume ulubuto.

title: TANDE NSHIKU SHONSE MBUTO SHA BUSUMA
lyrics:
1. Tande nshiku shonse mbuto sha busuma,
Tanda ku lucelo, na po kawa fwe;
Tulelolyo mwela, nshita ya kusepa,
Nga twaya tutila, tukasamwa pe.

Tukasamwa pe, tukasamwa pe
Nga twaya tukasamwa pe.
Tukasamwa pe, tukasamwa pe
Nga twaya tukasamwa pe, tukasamwa pe.

2. Tanda ku kasuba na ku cintelelwe,
Wilatina mfula, nangu buwani;
Tulecula nomba, limbi tukasepa;
Nga twaya tutila, tukasamwa pe.

3. Kanshi fwe balila, kanshi fwe banaka,
Tuletande mbuto sha Mfumu ine;
Ngo mulimo wapwa, ikesa tupoka
Nga twaya tutila, tukasamwa pe.

title: NA LIMBI 'IYO WE MUTIMA WANDI
lyrics:
1. Na limbi iyo we mutima wandi,
Shiwi lya Mpusushi;
'Mfumu nomba leka ntale mone,
Bushe musubile?

Eya; eya; Lesa njafweniko
Kuba wenu!
Mwanshita mu mulopa wafina
Wya! ndeba wenu.

2. Mu cikuku emo mpokelela
Kutemwa kwenu 'ku;
Muli Kristu e mo ndesubila,
Mucetekela pe.

3. Mwaishibe fyo nshikwete maka
Ndatina ukuwa,
Nimpenya maka mutumikile,
Yenu yefulisha.

4. Na nomba Mfumu twamupapata
Mubafwe 'ba bonse
Kuti bembe no mutina umo,
"Eya! ndeba wenu."

5. Kale bonse abamulombele
Abati, "Mutwafye,"
Bwangu bwangu, "Eya!" mwabaswike
Na kuli fwe nomba.

title: KATULA UMO WINE
lyrics:
1. Katula umo wine,
Wa bonse ba m'fyalo;
Ni Yesu kristu Mwine,
Lishinte ne Ntuo

Takuli limbi shina,
Takuli na shia,
Kano Kristu uwafina,
Watemwa, washila.

2. Ilambo limo line
Lya pa bubi bwesu,
Ku mwinshi na ko kumo,
Ne nshila ni Yesu.

3. Ku mwesu kwa pe kumo
Ukuli Ba Shifwe;
'Nasubi baba ba,o,
Kui Shikulwifwe.

title: IMPONGOLO YAISUKA
lyrics:
1. Impongolo yaisuka,
E umo kulefuma,
Ukubuta kwa pa Muti
Ukulang kutwemwa.

Uluse lwakule cibi,
Yaliisuka nyingile!
Ine! ine! yaiswilwa ine!

2. Impongolo e ya bonse
Balefwayo kutulwa;
Bakalamba na baice,
Ba ndimi ne mikowa.

3. Ingikeni nomba line,
Uluse luciiko;
Pokeleleni cimuti
Cilelange cikuku.

4. Kwi shilya tukayabika
Cimuti capindama
Tukayapoke cilongwe;
Ku Mfumu tukapalwa.

title: BUSHE, IWE NAUNAKA
lyrics:
1. Bushe, iwe naunaka,
Naupelelwa?
"Iso ko ndi," Yesu ati,
"Ushishe."

2. Bushe, akwete filaso
'Kuti mwishibe?
E, pa mbafu pa makasa
Ne ndupi.

3. Bushe, alifwele ngala
Pa mutwe wakwe?
Cine ngala alifwele,
Ya myunga.

4. Nga namusanga, namukonka
Cinshi akampa?
Umulimo ne filamba,
Fyapona.

5. Nga namukonka mupepi,
Cinshi ku ntanshi?
Ubulanda ne filamba
fikapwa.

6. Nga namulombo kumbula
Bushe akane?
'Waishile tula bantu,
Takana.

7. Nga nakonka, namutemwe,
Bushe ampale?
"Ba mu calo, ba mu mulu
Bati, "E"

title: BULE SHINA LYA KWA YESU
lyrics:
1. Bule shina lya kwa Yesu,
We walila, wacula;
Linasho bulanda bwesu,
Na ku fibi litula.

Ishina lyayemba!
tube na lyo, lyesu pe.
Ishina lyayemba!
tube na lyo, lyesu pe.

2. Bule shina lya kwa Yesu,
Libe 'nkwela yobe pe,
Ku nifwi ya m'lwani wesu,
Na ku fyonse fibepa.

3. Temwe shina lwakwa Yesu;
Lipelo mutende pe,
Libutusha mu nda shesu;
Liletwafwa twende pe.

4. Lumbe shina lya kwa Yesu;
Ku maboko apoka;
Yesu abo bumi bwesu;
Na ku lu se asoka.

5. Takalumbe shna, Yesu,
Nga twafika kwi sano
Ukuli ne Mfumu Yesu,
Lyasame fisamo.

title: UMFWA, WE MUTIMA WANDI
lyrics:
1. Umfwa we m'tima wandi,
Ni shikulu, aleti:
"Bushe, cine watemwa?"

2. "Nakukakwile kale,
'Filaso napseshe;
'Lubuto nakupele
'Mfifi yobe nalwile.

3. "Bushe, nyina alabe
'Mwana untu afyele?
Nalimo kalaba,
Ine ndamwibukisha.

4. Ine nabo luse
Lwacile fya mu mulu,
Lwacilye fya mu calo,
Lwa cine lwacile mfwa.

5. "Ukamono mucinshi
Luntu Tata ampele;
Ukekala na ine,
Pa ciouna candi pe."

6. Iye ndi no bulanda,
Nshamutemwishe cine
Lelo imwe natemwa,
Nakulamutemwisha.

title: YESU KALE AMFWAILE
lyrics:
1. Yesu kale amfwaile,
Nalyum mweni kutali;
Pa kuntula aposele
'Mweo wakwe pali ne.

Namutemwa, aleluya,
Namutemwa Mulubushi,
Namutemwa Yesu Kristu,
Amfilile pa kaifali.

2. Yesu nomba alefwaya
'Kuti nkonke nshiku pe;
Mu makasa um mwine
Aendele panonse.

3. Yesu mwine aka bwela;
'Kututwala ku mwakwe
E ko tukalaseka
Mu musumba wakwe pe.

title: AFUMINE KU MULU
lyrics:
1. Afumine ku mulu,
Yesu Mulubushi,
Aishile ngo muntu,
Yesu Mulubushi.

Imbeni ulwimbo lu,
Ebeni bonsha bantu;
Afumine ku mulu,
Yesu Mulubushi.

2. Afwilile ku muti
Yesu Mulubushi,
Ku kutula na ine,
Yesu Mulubushi.

3. Mu mulu abe Mfumu,
Yesu Mulubushi,
Tunakile, tutemwe
Yesu Mulubushi.

4. Ku mulu akekila
Yesu Mulubushi;
'Kututwala ku mwakwe,
Yesu Mulubushi.

title: KUFWAYA ABALUBA KWEKA
lyrics:
1. Kufwaya abaluba kweka,
No kupapata luse luse,
Yesu ati "Seni kuli ine"
Efyo ne lelo akebeta.

Akauyeni . . . mu tumishi tonse . . .
'Kubaleta . . . abaluba . . .
'Kubaleta . . . ku Mwine kacema .
Yesu Mwana . . . wa kubafwila.

2. Tubafishe kuli Yesu umwine,
Abanaka na ba cula,
No kubalanga ipusukilo,
Beshbe mwa kumweno mweo

3. Tufwaya kube nkombe sha luse.
'Kukonka Kristu 'nshiku shonse
Twafwe abawa nabwa banaka,
Baluba tubalange Yesu.

4. Tucetekele nshita ikesa,
Yeswa 'kabwela mu lulumbi,
Natwipeleshe ku milimo yu,
Banenswa bengi bapusuke.

title: YA KWA YESU IMBILA
lyrics:
1. Ya kwa Yesu imiba -
Atula!
Ku nko shonse ni mbila
Atula!
Soseni ci ca cine
Ku babifya bacula;
E lifunde lya Mwine,
Atula!

2. Mulebila pabuta,
Atula!
Mulekusho kukuta
Atula!
Mwe ba bemba. mulange,
'Calo conse cisamwe :
Atula!

3. Na pa kulwa mubile,
Atula!
'Wa pe e o wafwile,
Atula!
Mwimbe na po pafita,
No mutima wafula,
Ne mfwa nayo yapita,
Atula!

4. Yaya fye na pa mwela,
Atula!
Na ba nko basekela
Atula!
'pusukilo bukulu!
E co twimbe nshiko pe,
Atula!

title: SHIKULU YESU NDEKUTA
lyrics:
1. Shikulu Yesu ndekuta,
Kano mwangafwa nalafwa,
Pusukilo mundetele,
Mumbulu fintu ndi.

Mumbule ifyo ndi,
Mumbule ifyo ndi,
Yesu Kristu mwafwilile
Mumbule ifyo ndi,

2. Nga nanaka, nabipilwa,
Mwansumine umulopa,
Muncitile co mwatemwa,
Mumbule fintu ndi.

3. Mumone ine Katula
Muncitile co mwatemwa
Mutendeke no kupwisha,
Mumbuke fintu ndi.

4. Nshikwete maka 'kucita
Cintu cimo kuitala
Muntule pe, imwemweka
Mumbule fintu ndi.

title: BWELA,MWANA WALUBILE
YESU AITA BABI
lyrics:
1. Yesu aita babi,
abapokelela fye;
Bonse abalubile,
Bonse bangabwela fye

Imbileni, mwe bonse,
Yesu aita babi;
Ali no luse lonse,
Abapokelela fye.

2. Mwinse, mubyo mutende,
Eco ati, umfweni,
'Bubi bonse asende;
Mwe banaka iseni.

3. E usambo lubembu,
E uposho mutima;
Nomba ku cilye cakwe,
Teti ntine nakalya.

4. Yesu mweo wa babi,
No busuma ne cine;
Abaisa asambe,
Bakekala ku Mwine.

title: BWELA WE WALUBA, WE WANAKA
lyrics:
1. Bwela we waluba, we wanaka
Mona kacema alepapata;
Alefwaya ukukupususha,
Mupokelele, wilakokola.

Alepapata, aleita pe,
Umfwa Kacema alekwita,
Alepapata, aleita pe,
Alesosa, "Isa kuli 'ine!"

2. Alekupembela we ulefwa,
We walolele kutali kwine
Aliposele umweo wakwe
Kuti umone umweo iwe.

3. Umfwa imbila lya kwa Katula,
Asendele mpulumushi
Akupelyo umweo wa pe na pe.

4. Isa mu musango wa cine,
Yesu e mwinshi wa kwingililapo
Kacema alekwitano luse;
Wingilemo tekuti ulube.

title: MWE YESU MWALINTEMWA
lyrics:
1. Mwe Yesu mwalintemwa,
Ni kui 'imwe ndeisa;
Ico 'mwela waima,
Yampuma na mabimbi;
Mfiseni mwe Katula,
Ku fikali fya panshi,
Nkamone 'Pusukilo,
Ku mwenu 'ko ku mulu.

2. Kafwa umbi nshikwete,
Kani imwe, Shikulu:
Mwinsha fye, napapata,
Mulensunga nshiku pe.
Ndemucetekela pe,
Muli Katula Wandi,
'Mutwe wandi mucinge
Mu cintelelwe cenu.

3. Kristu ndwmufwaisha,
Nimwe mweo na maka,
Muleimya abafwa,
Mwe muti wa balwala,
Shina lyenu lisuma,
Ine muntu wabipa,
Njisula no bubi,
Mwa cine ne cikuku.

4. 'Luse lwenu lwafula,
Lwakunsamba ne mubi,
Nsambeni no ku mbaka,
Mbe wa cine ne subi,
Nimwe kamfuku,
Nwenshepo mweo wape,
Fukauka muli 'ne
Mweo ushipelela.

title: NIMWE NDESUBILA
lyrics:
1. Nimwe ndesubila,
Mwali pa Kalfali,
Mulubushi;
Mungumfwa mwi pepo,
Nsambeni fye nomba,
Natendeka lelo
Kuba wenu.

2. Mwe munsenamine,
No ku nkoselesha,
Mulenjimya;
Pantu mwamfwilile,
Kuti ntemwe imwe,
Lelo ne nshikupe;
Mu mutima.

3. Nga nayenda nh nfifi,
Yaisa macushi,
ntungululwe;
'Mfifi 'be kasuba,
Mumfute filamba
Mwindeka ntanduke
Kuli imwe.

4. Ngo lwendo lwa mweo,
Lukapwa mu calo,
Mukansenda;
Munjikate, twende,
No mwenso munsende
Munsende kuli 'mwe,
Nalubwa.

title: INE, UMWEO WANDINI YESU
MWE MPUKA BA KRISTU
lyrics:
1. Mwe mpuka ba Kristu,
Imeni, muyelwa;
'Maka ya kwa Lesa yenu,
Mu Mwana yapelwa.

2. Lesa wa maubumba!
Wakos o bali,
Ne Mfumu Yesu alumba,
A cinifye fikali.

3. Shipikisheni fye
Ku maka ya Mwine;
Ne fya BuLesa sendeni,
Mube buntu bwine.

4. Mwende nga bapika,
Mube 'bashinama;
Mwaumfwa kuli Mushika,
Ne shiwi mwalama.

5. Muye pe ku ntanshi,
Mupepe no kulwa;
Nyanteni fya mfifi panshi,
Munashe ne fyalwa.

6. I lyo kwapwo kulwa,
Mwapwisha na fyonse,
Mukasanga mwe bakulwa,
Batuntulu bonse.

title: MU BUSHIKU BWA BULANDA
lyrics:
1. Mu  bushiku bwa bulanda
Abanyendo balaya,
Balalumba no kuloba
Kuntu kwabo walaya.

2. Kulya kwabo kubekesha
Ni Kasomoku ntanshi;
Abe senge bakoshanya,
Benda bashipa nganshi.

3. Lumo lwasho lwa kwa Lesa
Ku lukuta lwashila;
E lutamfye fingatinya,
E lulanga ne nshila.

4. Cimo ico baendela
Ne subilo lyakosa,
Kumo kwine kulolela
Kuli ifyo Lesa 'sosa.

5. Lumo lwimbo lu lwa kwanga
Lwa kwa Shibo na Mwane;
Lumo lwendo no kupanga,
Kumo kwesha bayane.

6. Kumo kwanga nga bafika
Ku musumba mo wa pe;
Shibo umo ekwateka,
Uli no luse lwe pe.

title: MWE BASHILIKALE
lyrics:
1. Mwe bashilikale,
Mwaya ku buta,
'Lupanda lwa Mwine
Luletangila.
Yesu Mfumu yesu,
Akulatwensha,
No luunga lwesu
Twakulasenda.

Mwe bashilikale,
Mwaya ku buta,
'Lupanda lwa Mwine
Luletangila.

2. Pa bwanshisho bwesu
Baletamfiwa;
Elyoba kwa Yesu,
Twendeni, twanshe.
Na pa kwimba Kwesu
Kumbo kwatenta,
Imbileni Yesu,
Shisansuleni.

3. 'Bumba lya kwa Lesa,
Cilonganino;
Bane tuleenda
Nga bamushilo
'Fwe mubili umo
Tatwapatulwa
Mu becetekelo.
Nelyo mu luse.

4. E twendeni, bane,
Na bonse pamo,
Na mashiwi twimbe
Ulu lwimbo
'Lulumbi no luse
Lube kwa Kristu;
'Bantu balubulwa
Bailembo lu.

title: MWIMININENI YESU!
lyrics:
1. Mwiminineni Yesu!
Mwe ifita fyakwe,
Imyeni uluunga,
Mwikalulofya mwe.
Aletutangilila,
Assuke abacimfye,
Abe Mfumu eka.

2. Mwiminineni Yesu!
Suminine bonse,
Kalweni na balwani,
Eko alemwita;
Kabiyeni mwe bonse,
Muye mulwe nabo,
Ikatisheni bonse,
Mube abashipa.

3. Mwiminineni Yesu!
Mu maka yakwe fyr;
Amaka ya bantunse,
Te kuti yamwafwe.
Shangileni pepeni,
Mulemulolela;
Kabiyeni bonse.

4. Mwiminineni Yesu!
Ubuta bukapwa,
Mu calo kulwa pepe,
Mu mulu mutende,
Uyo wayasha fyonse
'Citebo apelwa,
Akaba no mutende
Uyo ushakapwe.

title: MWE FITA FYA LUPANDA
lyrics:
1. Mwe fita fya lupanda
Fya kulwila fwaleni;
Satana e wa maka,
Lweni fita, koseni.

2. Na mu calo ca mfifi
Imyeni uluunga,
Ulu lufunguluke,
Ku ntanshi lusumbulwe.

3. Mu mishi ya bulanda,
Tamwaba na mashiwi,
Mwe nkombe sha kwa Yesu
Kabiyeni ne landwe.

4. Kuntu kwabe finshngwa
Batwalileni cine;
Uko kwabe fyabipa,
'Bupisusho mwananye.

5. Ku banaka, 'baluba,
Bebeni no mutende;
Ku baposwa, 'balanda,
Soseni umutende.

6. Sungeni abapina,
Sansamusheni bonse;
Mu maka ya kwa Lesa,
Tamfyeni fibi fyonse.

7. Fungululenyu lunga,
No lupanga lwe shiwi,
Fisuke fyalo fyonse
Fikabe fya kwa Yesu.

title: WE FIBI, FUMA
lyrics:
1. We fibi, fuma
Katula 'lipo
Takakokole
Ukwisa ntula.
Ine ndepena fye
Wenya 'lengwafwa
Nga tuli na Kristu
Ndasule nkuta.

2. Ilyo pafita
ECilongoshi
candi, kukonka
mga takuli menshi
'Bantu bandua
'Shiwi asosele
Akalifisha.

3. Kale luse lwakwe
E cishibilo,
Teti andeke
'Kutotobela
Ifya Ebenesa
Ninjibukisha.
Finengo kwishiba
Akalangafwa.

4. Tekuti ngwinte
Ifimponena
Ifya kwafywe fi
Anjeba kale.
Bonsha bakamona
Ubupususho,
mu mulanda yengi
bakonke Mfumu.

5. 'Fya my lukumbo
Ifyo anwene
Fya kuluka mwe!
teti tulande.
Inshila yayafya
Umwa 'twendele!
Wene alecula
bushe ifwe 'yo?

title: MWE MPUKA YA BALENDO
lyrics:
1. Mwe mpuka ya balendo,
Muleya ku ntashi,
Na Yesu ngo munenu,
Kwa Yesu e mutwe.

2. Mwaanga nga mwabomba
Ifyo abombele;
Mwaanga nga mwacula
Ifyo aculile.

3. 'Lupanda asendele,
Amusendele 'mwe;
Ingala alifwele,
Alimufwalile.

4. Fya kumwesha fyaisa,
'Malanda mwakwata,
Kabili fyamutunka,
Imfwa ikapwisha.

5. Ifi fyabe fisano
Fya mutengo 'kuku
Fileba ng mutanto
'Kunina ku mulu.

6. Mwe mpuka ya balendo,
Loleshenyu mulu,
Uko ifya cikonko
Fikabe cilambu.

title: ILINTU MUTENDE ULEYA NA INE
lyrics:
1. Ilintu mutende uleya na ine,
Nangwa malanda yesa pe;
'Kuti njishibe ni mwe mwafundishisha
'Mutende, 'mutende kuli ine.

'Mutende. . . kuli ine. . .
'Mutende. . .mutende kuli 'ne.

2. Satana nga ntunka, ngo kwisa kweshiwa,
Naishibe landwe ili;
Alimfwilile. Kristu nandubula,
''Mutende, 'mutende kuli ine.

3. Impulumushi shintu naulungene,
Te shimo fye, lelo shonse,
Shalipampaminwa na ku lupunda,
'Mutende, 'mutende kuli ine.

4. Na ine ndefwaya njikate Kristu;
Nga yakamfimba mabimbi,
Te kuti ntine; mu mfwa nga mu mweo,
'Mutende, 'mutende kuli ine.

5. E kwisa kwenu ndepembela,mwe Mfumu,
Ku mwesu te ku cilindi;
'Penga lwa mungeli. 'shiwi lya Mfumu,
'Mutende, 'mutende kuli ine.

title: UMUTENDE,MU CALO CABIPA
lyrics:
1. Umutende, mu calo cabipa?
'Mutende, Yesu atepelesha.

2. Umutende, nge cuto yapamfya?
'Kutombela Yesu e kuutusha.

3. Umutende, ' bulanda bwafula?
'Mutende, Yesu pa cifuba.

4. Umutende, mfuluka ku mwesu?
'Mutende mu kulamwa na Yesu.

5. Umutende, fya ntanshi fyafiswa?
Yesu twaishiba, aleteka.

6. Umutende, nge mfwa ilenshinga?
Na maka Yesu anshishe imfwa.

7. E cisuma; fyonse fikaleka,
'Mutende wa ku mulu watwita.

title: NDI WENU MFUMU, NALYUMFWA SHIWI
lyrics:
1. Ndi wenu Mfumu, nalyumfwa shiwi,
Lyanjebelyo kutemwa;
Lelo ndafwayo kupalamako
Pepi pepi kuli imwe.

Mpalamikwe pepi mwe Mfumu,
Kulyo 'ko mwamfwilile,
Mpalamikwe pepi pepi mwe Mfumu,
Kulyo 'ko mwandashilwe.

2. Kangobelwe mu kumubombela,
<pwelwa maka. cikuku;
Mpunamineko no busumino,
Ndosho mo mufwaila.

3. E yaweme nshita napepamo,
Ilyo mufukamine;
Na ine nsoshanya ne mwe Lesa,
'Fyo nsosa ne cibusa.

4. Kwalibo kutemwa nshingeshiba,
Kano ninshi nkabuke;
Kwabakwe nseko nshingakumamo,
Kano ntushe pe ne mwe.

title: YESU NAMUTEMWA SHIKULU WANDI
lyrics:
1. Yesu namutemwa Shikulu wandi
'Cibwe-camba candi Umupusushi,
Katula wa luse, nkamwimbila fye pe,
E imwe mwalinga, e imwe mwalilnga,
E imwe mwalingo kulumbanya.

2. Namutemwa pantu mwantemwa ine
Mwalinculile cibi ku kaufale,
Impumi yenu yalaswa ne myunga
E imwe mwalinga, e imwe mwalilnga,
E imwe mwalingo kulumbanya.

3. 'Kuti namutemwa mu mweo, mu mfwa,
'Kuti namutotele nshiku shonse,
No Kwimba ningemba ne mfwa pa mpumi,
E imwe mwalinga, imwe mwalilnga,
E imwe mwalingo kulumbanya.

4. Ilyo tukamono lulumbi lwenu,
Na benu banino kuba nr mwe pe,
Mu bumpashanya bwenu nkapundila.
E imwe mwalinga, e imwe mwalilnga,
E imwe mwalingo kulumbanya.

title: MWE MFUMU M NSOSHE, NSOSE
lyrics:
1. Mwe Mfumu munsoshe, nsose
Misango yenu ya mweo,
Ifyo mufwaya, kamfwaye
Abana benwa naluba.

2. Mutungulule 'ne wine,
Ntungulule abaluba,
Mundisho kuti 'ne ndishe
Abana benwa na nsala.

3. Munkoshe mu kwiminina
Pa libwe lya maka yenu,
Ntambikyo kuboko kwandi,
Kuli abo abanwena.

4. Mumfundisho kuti mfunde
Fintu fyenu ifya cine,
'Mashiwi yandi yengile
Mu ba mitima yakosa.

5. Mumpelyo butushoo bwenu,
'Kuti nsose no kutemwa;
Amashiwi ayalinga
Ku bafilwa, 'ba bulanda.

6. Mumpale mwe Mfumu yandi,
Kutyu mutima wisule,
Matontonkanyo, 'mashiwi
Yalango kutemwa kwine.

7. Munengyo Kumubombela
Uko konse mwansontela,
Nsuke mumoneku mpumi,
Yalango kutemwa kwine.

title: UBUFUMU BWISE
lyrics:
1. Ubufumu bwise,
'Bwa lusho lubuto,
Bulete kuno mutende
Ku mulu, na mano.

2. Mu mitima yesu
Mwise mutekemo,
'Cilaka ca bololoke
Kacibelelemo.

3. Ubufumu bwise,
Bwangu bapalwemo;
Mashiwi musalanganye
Yatupe cikuku.

4. 'Bena fyalo bonse
Bwangu bapalwemo;
Babe bamunyina bonse,
Bakele fye pamo.

5. Ubufumu bwise,
Ne cipuna cenu,
Mucibike panwesonde,
Mupale ba calo.

title: MWE KRISTU, KATEKA
lyrics:
1. Mwe Krisyu, Kateka,
Mwe bakose cibi,
Mutobe ku maka
Ulumya lwababi.

2. ' Buteko bwa luse
No bwa kutemwana,
Mwileka tupuse,
No kulapatana.

3. Muleke filepwa
'Fikali no kulwa,
Na fyonse fyatipwa
Filesho kutulwa.

4. Mwe Mfumu, iseni,
Ngo mwela wakuka
Tusansamusheni
Fwe bamufuluka.

5. Abantu basula,
'Mimbulu Isaka;
Ukwanga kwabula,
Abenu banaka.

6. Ku fyalo kutali
Imfifi yakula;
Mwebeko bene,
Mwe Kristu, Katula.

title: UPEPE LESA
lyrics:
1. Upepe Lesa!
Wilapepa fintu fimbi;
Ulemutemwa ku mutima
No kucila bantu bambi.
Upepe Lesa!

2. Leko kulapa!
Mwi ishina lya kwa Lesa
Kano nga waya lubulula
Ku Mfumu iya milandu.
Leko kulapa!

3. 'Nshiku sha Lesa
Ulepepe Mfumu bwino
Wilafumina ku milimo,
Utushe no kepepela
'Nshiku sha Lesa.

4. Abakufyele
Abatemwe, ubalele,
Ubalombele Lesa obe;
Ubalonganye ku mwakwe,
Abakufye.

5. Wilaipaya!
Utemwe no wa misoka;
Uluse upashanye Lesa
Uluse akubelela
Wilaipaya.

6. Wilayangala!
No bwangalo bwabipisha.
Fumyapo umutima obe
'Kuti Lesa obe 'kwafwa.
Wilayangala!

7. Sulo bupupu!
Wikabila ulepula,
Upulataba no mulandu;
'Bupupu bwapata Lesa.
Sulo bupupu!

8. Wibepa bufi!
Nga walubuka Mfumu;
Kubepo bufi e lisambi:
Ibukisha ku milandu,
Wibepa ubufi.

9. Fumyo mutima
Ku mukashi wa mubiyo;
Wibembuka na ushaupwa,
Kubutwa ne fibi fyonse,
Fumyo Mutima.

10. Fyuma fya bene
Wilakumbwa no kukumbwa;
Shita pa kuti fibe fyobe
Wilafipoka ku maka,
Fyumu fya bene.

title: UKUPEPA
lyrics:
1. Upepe ku macaca,
Upepe akasuba;
Upepepa cungulu,
Upepyo bushilu.
No m'tima onse wine,
Fya panshi ufumye
Kumubyo lefukama,
