Mu nkama upepe.

2. 'Fibusa ibukisha,
Pepela babiyo;
Pepela aballwani,
Nga balekucusha.
Ulombe ngo li weka
Ifyo ulebulwa;
'Mapepo yonse lomba
Mwi shina lya Yesu.

3. Nga wabulwe cifulo,
Mu nkama upepe
Lelwa matontonkanyo,
Yabuta yabepo.
Yengile muli lwe
No mwine ku mulu
Kulyu Yo umfwa pe.

4. Tatuli no bupalo,
'Bwalingana bulwa
Shifwe aletupela
Bulya nga twalomba.
Uli ne nsoni, bushe?
Kuli Yesu pepa,
Ibukisha, sekela,
Lesa 'likutemwa.

title: MWE MFUMU, E CAWAMISHA
lyrics:
1. Mwe Mfumu, e cawamisha,
Bwaca no bwailo kwisa
Kuli imwe no kepepa.

2. Kuno ukuli tondolo,
Tatulatendeke ncito,
Twalombe lelo bupalo.

3. Nga bwaila inshiku pe,
Twisa fisama kuli 'mwe,
Ukuti tumutotele.

4. Mubyo lubuto kacelo,
Kuli ifwe ni pa lwendo,
Tulwishe fibi mwi pepo.

5. Nge ncito cungulo,
Twaisa yebelelapo,
Kabinge mubyo lubuto,

6. Ni mwe Lubuto lwa fyalo,
Tutungululeni na pano,
Kacelo pe ne cungulo.

title: PEPENI LESA MU MUSHILO WAYEMBA
TWAISA, TWAISA M' NGANDA
lyrics:
1. Twaisa, twaisa, m' nganda yenu
Kupepa imwe, mwe Mfumu.

2. Iseni, iseni kuli ifwe;
Tulelindilila mwe Bene.

3. Mubule. mubue ukutota,
Tuletotela imwe pano.

4. Umfweni, umfweni, mwe Shikulu,
Ifyo twalalomba ku Mfumu.

5. Tulomba, tulomba, shi mufushe
be bumba lyenu ilya panshi.

6. Bakeni, bakeni, ifwee bonse
Pa kweshiwa ku fibi fyonse.

7. Fwe babi mutusambe;
Ifilonda fyesu muposhe.

8. Tubute, tubute imitima,
Tupashanye Yesu ubusuma.

9. Twafweni, twafweni, mwe Shikulu.
Tutemwe imwe Lesa M'kulu.

title: MWE CENGE CA LUSE, NTUNGULUSHI
lyrics:
1. Mwe cenge ca luse, Ntungulushi,
Nyensheni mwe;
Bwaila ye, kwalepa ku mushi!
Nyensheni mwe.
Nshileti mone ifya kutali;
Ndeyenda naikato to muli

2. Kale nshali ifyo, nshali walomba,
"Nyensheni mwe,"
Nali wasala fye nshila nomba
Nyensheni mwe;
Nali wapumba, nati njikale,
Mwe Lesa, Ye! labeni sha kale.

3. Mwe bafwa kuli nomba, nyensheni;
Ifyo fine.
Mwafwe mu mpili, m'nika. cesheni
Ubwa cine:
Elyo kwaula nkomfwa kwashila,
Kwa batemwikwa batangilila.

title: MWISE NJAFWA, LESA M'KULU
lyrics:
1. Mwise njafwa, Lesa m'kulu,
Ukwenda muno calo;
Nanaka, muli na maka,
M'njikate ku kuboko;
Cilyo cine ca mulu,
Mulendisha mu calo.

2. Ku ntulo mone amenshi
'Yabeka, mpembula;
No m'lilo wenu ne kumbi
Fibe fintungulula;
Mwe bakosa, mwe Katula,
Ncingeni pe ku maka.

3. Pa kufika ku m'longa wa mfwa,
Munjikate, munyenshe;
Imwe mwacimfishe imfwa,
Munjabushe, mumfishe:
Nkamulumba, mwe Kacimfya,
Amalumbo aya pe.

title: WE MULENDO ULEYS KWI?
lyrics:
1. We mulendo uleya kwi?
Teka mutima obe.
Ubombesha kuni kwine
‘Suke Mfumu ise.

Lindilileni, lindilila, lindilila.

2. Ubupanda kuli Lesa
Tulemwebe fye cine.
Ubombeshe unakishe
Elyo’ kesa tusha

3. Bushe ‘li mushilikale
We kalinda?
Bushe ukeminina pe
Ku menso ya Mfumu?

4. Mukomfwe penga likalila
Ku muli.
Imwe bonse mukeme
Pe shina lya ntashi.

5. Koloke, Ho! Koloke, Ho!
Ni mwe bantu bakwani?
Koloke, Ho! Koloke, Ho!
Ni few bantu bene Yesu! Lindilila!

title: LESA MUTUPALE
lyrics:
1. Lesa, mutupale
Mube no luse pe
Lekeni mpumi ya Mfumu
Itubalikile.

2. Calo cishibishe,
Ne mikowa yonsu,
Cikuku cenu cisuma
Ciletula bonse.

3. Bacindike imwe,
Bantu bacindike;
Mikowa isekelele,
Bonse bamwimbile.

4. Imwe mupingule
Mwalilungamisha;
Muteke bantu mu cine,
Bonse ba mikowa.

5. Bantu bamilumbe,
Bamulumbe bonse;
Banono na bakalmba
Batashe imwe pe.

6. Calo catatwala;
Lesa ‘tume palo;
Abantu balamutina
Ku mpela sha calo.

title: YESU NYENSHA NILUBA
lyrics:
1. Yesu nyensha, niluba,
Nyesha bwino mu nshila;
Ndi bwino nga mulipo,
Muli ‘mwe njikalemo.

Nyensha, nyensha
Yesu nyensha, niluba;
Nyensha bwino mu nshila
Nshiku shonse ne nshita.

2. Ni mwe cubo kuli ‘ne,
Nga matunko yesu pe;
Ndi fye ngo li mupepi,
Ncetekela muli ‘we.

3. Yesu nyensha ku mpela,
Ya bwikalo na ku mfwa;
Nsuke mfike kwi shilys
Kulyo bulanda bwapwa.

title: MU BULANDA BONSE UBO USANGA
lyrics:
1. Mu bulanda bonse ubo usanga,
Mu kushuka konse, mu kupelelwa,
Penda fintu fyonse Lesa akupa
‘Cine uletasha pantu fya fula.

Pende fintu fyonse fisuma!
Pende fya bupe bwa kwa Lesa!
Penda kale, penda na nomba,
‘Cine uletasha pantu fya fula.

2. Wafininya no kucula we mwana?
Capindama usendele cafina?
Penda fintu fyonse Lesa akupa,
Ukwimba no kwanga nelyo wacula.

3. Wibika mutima pa fya panonse,
Losha menso kuli Kristu ku ntashi,
Penda fya bupe bwakwe ifyacisha,
Ne fya ku mwabo uleo atangila.

4. Nomba mu kulwisha konse witendwa
Lesa mukalamba alekumona,
Wenw aishibe nshila uleya,
Lwendo lonse mwine akulakwafwa.

title: MWE MFUMU NYENDE NA IMWE
lyrics:
1. Mwe Mfumu, nyende na imwe
Mu nshila sha milimo pe;
Munjebe bwino mungafwe,
Mu mulilo no bulanda.

2. Mungafwe ncincishe bantu
Ne shiwi lya luse lwenu;
Ndetungulula baluba,
Ku nshilla yenu yawama.

3. Mumpelyo mute' na imwe
Nyende mu bucibusa pe
Mu milimo ncetekela
Mwi subilo nkacimfya.

4. Lubuto lwenu lube pe
Mu nshila yandi panonse;
'Mutende wenu mumpele,
Mwe Mfumu njikale ne mwe.

title: KU MINWE LESA NJIKATA
lyrics:
1. Ku minwe Lesa ‘njikata,
Ndeendo lwendo na Tata;
Mu mfifi ma mu kubuta
Ni Tata e wanjikata.

Anondola Lesa Tata,
‘Minwe yakwe yanjikata;
Imbe mukonshi wa cine,
Pantu alondola ine.

2. Inshila nga yayafisha,
Ku fibi fingi nga ‘mpisha,
Ishiwi lyakwe lyanjita;
Ni Tata e wanjikata.

3. Mwe Tata, nyende pe ne mwe,
No kuba fye ne cimwemwe;
Nsekele na ku fyapona;
Wanyenshe fi, e umona.

4. Ngo lwendo lwandi napwisha,
No luse lwenu lwanfisha
Ku mwesu uko ndelola,
Ni Tata e wanondola.

title: MFISA MWE MFUMU MWE BENE
lyrics:
1. Mfisa mwe Mfumu, mwe bene.
Mu lwafyo lwenu,
Lubuto lobe lumfimbe,
Nkumone pa menso.

Mfisa, mfisa
We Mupusushi mfisa,
We Mfumu ndama
Mfisame muli ‘we

2. Icipupu canyimina,
Kuno uko ndi,
Mpisha ku mulu waciko,
Nsumbulwe kuli ;we.

3. ‘Musana nga wafunika
Mu kuculisha,
Pa kukuta, “Mfumu ngafwa,”
We mwine ngasuka.

4. Mfisa, Mfumu napapata,
Nshili na maka,
We wa maka Mupusushi,
Ni we mulubushi.

title: YESU MUTWENSHE
lyrics:
1. Yesu, mutweshe,
Tuye tutushe,
Nelyo nshila ilecusha,
Tukakonka no kukosa;
Tungululeni,
Twende na imwe.

2. Nshila yayfye,
Ciwa capimfya,
Twitwishika no kutina,
Tube few abasumina;
Twende tushipe
Na ku balwani.

3. Apo twacula,
Nga batusula;
Nga twatunkwa no kweshiwa,
Mwise twafwa mwe kacinfya;
Tulosha menso
Uko ku mwesu,

4. Yesu mutwenshe
Tuya tutushe
‘Ntungulushi yak u mulu,
Mutucinge muno calo,
Tusuke tube
Pamo na imwe.

title: ULIKO MUSUMBA
lyrics:
1. Uliko musumba,
Usuma ku mulu;
Takuli cintu ca kukowesha
Icingafikako.

2. Katula ninjisa,
No kumupapata
‘Kuti munsambe,
Ku fyapipa fyandi.

3. Kristu ndefwaisho
Kubo mwana wenu;
Munsunge bwino, munsunge bwino
Pa kuluba kwandi

4. Kuti njikaleko,
Ku mulu na imwe;
‘Kubuta tutu, ‘kubuta tutu
Mu calo ca luse.

title: UMWEO MWAPELE
lyrics:
1. Umweo mwapele
Mulandu wa ine;
Mwati mundubule
Mbwele ku mfwa kwine:
Mwafwilile ine,
Mwe Lambo lya cine.

2. Mwapishishe myaka
Mwali no kunaka;
Mwati, “Nkalabaka
Ku m’tende wan taka”
Mwapishishe ine
Mona pe ‘fye cine

3. Ku mwenu kwabuta
Mwashile; mwaise
Mu calo ‘mwafits,
Na babi bacusha:
Mwaishile ine,
Munkwata mwe Mwine.

4. Mwe mfumu, mwacula
Ye, mwacula cibi;
Mwatile, “Ndetua
Abafwa mu fibi”
Mwaculile ine,
Monyo mweo wine.

5. Mwafumya kwi sano
‘Busuma bwa bupe,
‘Fya maka fya mano,
No mweo nshiku pe;
Mwalete fya bupe,
Na ine nkamupa.

6. Ndemupo mutima,
Ne wene, ndebomba;
“fyandi ndemufima,
Nalayana nomba:
N\mwaipa kuli ne,
Naipa kuli mwe.

title: IFYO NDI, -NSHITELEBWILA
lyrics:
1. Ifyo ndi, -nshitelebwila
Umulopa wansimune
Kuli imwe, mwe banjita,
Mwe Mfumu, naisa.

2. Ifyo ndi,-nshilepembela
Kufumya cimo cabipa,
Kulim mwe, mwe ba kunsamba
Mwe Mfumu, naisa.

3. Ifyo ndi,-mwalinjishiba,
Napenampena ne fingi,
Kulwishanya mu mutima,
Mwe Mfumu, naisa.

4. Ifyo ndi-‘mupina, ‘mopfu,
Kampoke fyuma fya mpomfu;
Ukufisanga ku mwenu;
Mwe Mfumu, naisa.

5. Ifyo ndi-mwampokelela,
Kunjelela no kunsamba,
Fya mwalaya nasumina,
Mwe Mfumu, naisa.

6. Ifyo ndi-‘kutemwa kwenu,
Kwayanshe filwani bwangu,
Nomba, mwe mfumu, ndi wenu;
Mwe Mfumu, naisa.

title: YESU ALETWITA BONSE
lyrics:
1. Yesu aletwita bonse,
Twime, twende, tukonke;
Kwi shiwi lyanaka ‘leti,
“Mwina Kristu, unkonke,”

2. Ifyo baumfwa na kale
Kuli bemba Galili,
Baleke fyonse fya panshi,
Batemwe mfumu iyi.

3. Aletwita nefwe lelo,
Ati, “Fyafye wiyesha,
Wilolela fya mu calo;
Mwina Kristu ntemwisha.”

4. Ku kutusha no kubomba,
Ku kucula no kwanga,
Aisako, aletweba,
Muntemwe no musamwe.

5. Aletwita; mwe Ba luse,
Muletwafwo kwitaba,
Tupe mitima, tuteshe,
No kubomba kuli mwe.

title: BUNO BUSHIKU KUSHUKA
lyrics:
1. Buno bushiku kushuka
Apo nasanga katula;
‘Mutima wandi wayanga;
Ndebeba fye ‘bantu bonse.

‘Kushuka! ‘Kushuka!
Apo ansamba ku fibi!
No kumfundisho kupepa
No kunsekele nshiku pe;
‘Kushuka! ‘Kushuka!
Apo ansamba ku fibi!

2. ‘Mulandu onse upwile!
Ne wa kwa Yesu, wafutwa;
Ankula ine no luse
Na ine nomba ndekonka.

3. Utushe fye we mutima
Wifuma ku Mfumu yobe;
Sango mutende lwa Lesa;
Fisuma fyonse ukwete.

4. Lesa aumfwe layano,
Akulaumfwe nshiku pe,
Isuke imfwa ikese,
Nkalumbe Mfumu ya luse.

title: MWE YESU NINSUMINO
lyrics:
1. Mwe Yesu ninsumino
Kumutumikila;
Mube ‘pepi na ine
Shikulu, Cibusa.
Teti ntine fyabipa
Nga muli mupepi;
Nelyo kuluba luba
Ngo li ntugulushi.

2. Ngumfwe muli kuno ndi,
Fya calo filipo,
Namone fintwi fingi
Ne filentunkapo.
'Balwani nabo bali
Mukati na kunse;
Mwe Yesu mumpalame,
Mumbake ku fibi.

3. Ngumfwe fyo mulelanda
Ne shiwi lyawama,
Kukana umfwe fya fye,
Nelyo ifyabipa.
Soseni njishibishe,
No kuntungulula;
Soseni ngufwikishe,
Mwambako mutima.

4. Mwe Yesu mwalaile
Bonsha bamukonka;
Bakaba uko muli,
Cifulo cisuma.
Mwe Yesu nalailyo
Kutumikila pe;
Mumpele icikuku,
Mwe Shikulu nkonke.

5. Nkamone nkasa shenu,
Nyendemo ne mwine;
Nakulakonka bwino,
Mu maka yenu pe.
Ntungululwe, munjite,
Munjikatishe pe;
Elyo mumpokelele,
Ku kulu kuli ‘mwe.

title: ESHA PE, USHILE, UMFWE KU MFUMU
lyrics:
1. Esha pe, ushile, Umfwe ku Mfumu;
Ikala kwa Yesu, Ulyeko iwe.
Twemwa bana bakwe, Afwa banaka.
Fwaye palo lyakwe, Ne cebo baka.

2. Esha pe, ushile, ‘Calo ciumya
Ikala ku mabali,Yesu awamya;
Wabe bakeshiba Yesu apala.

3. Esha pe, ushile, Leka akwenshe,
Wende nankwe pamo, Wiya pa natanshi:
Pabipa, pawama, Wende na Yesu;
E was ale nshila, E mweo wesu.

4. Esha pe, ushile, Teko mutima;
Eba yesu fyonse, Kuti fyashima.
Enda no Mupashi, poke fya bupe,
E fyo uwaminwe, ku mweo w ape.

title: TE KUTI NKANE YESU YO
lyrics:
1. Te kuti nkane Yesu yo,
Ndemucetekela;
Pa muti ancito mweo,
Ne shiwi lindela.

Pa muti, pa muti yashibulwa menso,
Ne cafina candi casendwa fye;
Mwandubwile, mwansenda no mwenso
Nomba mwampelo kusamwa pe.

2. Ni Yesu Mwine Katula,
Ishina ndelumba,
Tasebanya abakula
Kulya ku musumba.

3. Ilayano lyakwe lya cine
Kuti ambakila
Ico napele ku Mwine
Ku nshita yashila.

4. Akanumbula ne shina
Kuli Lesa Wishi,
No kunjikasho washina
Ku mwabo ku mushi.

title: TULEYAKU KUBYALA
lyrics:
1. Tuleys ku kubyala
Ku ntashi tukasanga
Fisabo fya fulisha
Ifya kukushe mibili.

Fisabo fya fulisha,
Fisabo fya fulisha,
Fisabo fya fulisha,
Ifya kukushe mibili.

2. Twatota no kutota
Kuli Lesa wesu
Pa kutupela fyonse
No bupalo bukalamba.

3. E calenga mwe mfumu
Twalomba kuli imwe
Tubyale mu mitima
Ifisabo fya mipashi.

title: TULIMA NO KUTANDA
MFUMU YA MULU NA PANSHI
lyrics:
1. 'Mfumu ya mulu na panshi
Kuli 'mwe lubyo lulumbi,
Tulangyo kutemwa shani
Kuli imwe?

2. Twaikala n mutende
Pantwi fisuma twapelwa,
Kuli imwe twatotela,
Mwatupa fye.

3. 'Mwana wenu umo wine,
Mwabike lambo lya cine,
No luse lwafula lwine
Mutupe fye.

4. Mupashi washilishiwa,
'Maka no mweo no luse,
Aishilyo kuba ne fwe,
Mwatupa fye.

5. Bantwa bengi balubulwa,
'Mpulumushi shaelelwa,
Ba Tata twamutotela,
Mwatupa fye.

6. Twatotela kuli Imwe,
'Mweo, 'mutende na fyonse,
Twikalilile nenu pe,
Mwatupa fye.

title: YEMWE, TUYEMFYA BANE
lyrics:
1. Yemwe,
Tuyemfye bane, tuleyemfyo bwinga,
Tulesefyo bwinga bwa Mwana wa Mpanga
E shibwings wesu Mwana wa kwa Lesa,
Tulumbanye Mfumu ya kutemwe kwesu
Tutemwe bane, tusekele bonse,
Pakupela Mfumu ubu bupe bwesu.
Ilambo lya cine e mitima yesu,
Tuyemfye bane, eya tuyemfye bane.

2. Mwe mfumu
Twaleto bupe bwa kutemwa kwesu,
Mbalala ne fyumbu ne fipushi.
Amanni no bunga no lupiya.
E kutemwe kwesu kuli Tata wesu,
Twapapata Tata ifwe bana benu,
Mupokelele mulambulo wesu
Twaipela kuli mwe tuli bantu benu.
Tuyemfye bane, eya tuyemfye bane.

3. Tata,
Tulemutotela pa bumi bwesu,
pa fipatala na babomfi bonse.
Pa masukulu na bakafundisha,
Na baletuteka na bafyashi besu.
Pa fifwalo fyesu, na pa filyo fyonse.
Na pa kutufwila mwatwanshishe mfwa.
Na pa busuma bwa maluba yonse,
Tulumbanye Mfumu ni Yesu kristu.

4. Bonse,
Tutotele Mfumu pa bupe bukulu
Atumine yesu kwisa tupususha,
E ni Mfuma yesu, akateke calo,
ne mikowa yonse ikamutotela,
Pantu e mukulu washamfumu shonse,
Twatotela Tata ifwe bantu bene.
Lumbanyeni Mfumu e kabumba wesu
Mwe fibumbwa fyonse fya mu calo conse.

title: LESA ABE NEMWE NSHIKU PE
lyrics:
1. Lesa aba nemwe nshiku pe,
ku cikuku amufunde,
Nga mwe mpanga amukumbe
Lesa aba nemwe nshiku pe.

Tukumane, tukumane,
Ku makasa ya Mwine;
Tukumane, tukumane,
Lesa aba nemwe nshiku pe.

2. Lesa aba nemwe nshiku pe,
Kumapindo amucinge,
No kuteya pe ifingi:
Lesa aba nemwe nshiku pe.

3. Lesa aba nemwe nshiku pe,
Nge filwani fyamuwila,
Wene alefukatila;
Lesa aba nemwe nshiku pe.

4. Lesa aba nemwe nshiku pe,
Luse lwape amulange,
Ku mfwa kwine lumusange;
Lesa aba nemwe nshiku pe.

title: NOMBA PA KWINGILA
lyrics:
1. Nomba pa kwingila
Ku mwaka upya,
'Mashiwi yawama
Yatukosesha.
'Shiwi lya kwa Tata,
Lyatusosesha;
Ishiwi lya maka
Lyatusekesha.

Twende no kushipa
'Bana ba Mfumu,
Pantwi shiwi lyakwe
Libelelela.

2. Lesa ali ne fwe
Ifyo asosa,
Alatwafwa lyonse,
Teti tutine.
"Ine ndemubaka,
'Kuboko kwandi
Kulemufishisha.
Ku cinso candi."

3. 'Mwaka uletampa
Mu luse lwakwe,
Bonse bakamona
Fya bupe fyakwe
Babi na balanda
Balwelwe pamo
Kuli aba bonse
Kulyu bupalo.

4. Teti atulabe,
Nangu kutusha,
Pantu alaile
'kuba na ifwe.
Tumucetekele
'Mwako no wine,
Lesa ali ne fwe
'Nshiku shonse pe.

title: MWAKA UMBI WALIPITA
lyrics:
1. Mwaka umbi walipita,
'Nshita ya lubilo;
Twaise lelo kupepa
No kwimbo lwimbo.

Twaisa. . . .Twaisa. . .
Twaisa mucelela,
Twaisa. . . Twaisa. . .
Twaisa no lwimbo.

2. Twaisa lumbanya Yesu
No kwimbilo luse
Lwa uwatwita ku mulu
No watubaka pe.

3. Twalumbanishisho bupe
Bwa mwako yu wapwa,
Twaimba layano lyakwe
No kusanshikisha.

4. Yatote mitima yesu
Umwaka walipwa,
Twacetekela mwe Yesu
Pali uno upya.

title: TATA TWENDE NE MWE PE
lyrics:
1. Tata twende ne mwe pe,
Imbe wenu 'nshiku pe,
Mulenengo wa cine,
ncite ne fyo fiyene.

2. Ku fyayafye fyafula,
Imwe kuti mwantula;
Mulembaka mu nshila,
Imbe wenu wabila.

3. Nga caise cakwesha,
Kuti mwaba bantesha;
Na po naba fye neka;
Mulencinga ku maka.

4. Nga nabuta ku m'tima,
Ni mwe; fyaye fyafina!
E lyo nabo watemwa,
Kuli Tata natemwa.

5. Imbe ne wacita pe
Panwe sonde 'fya bupe;
Mulendsha kwi sano,
E ko imbe, ndi mwano.

title: TULI ABANA BANONO
lyrics:
1. Tuli abana abanono,
Tatwafyelwe bakankala,
Bushe, twalacitila nshi
Yesu waluse, Musuma.

2. Abana bonse ba Mfumu
Bacite ifyo yafunda;
Batemwe Yesu, bakonke,
Baleshe ne fibi mu nda.

3. Fwe bana nga twaikusha,
Ne cipyu cesu calula.
Tulolesha mitima yesu,
Twisosa fyafye, twisula,

4. 'Banensu nga batucenda,
Basosa fintu fyabipa,
Twasuke fye bwino bwino,
Tupale Yesu washipa.

5. Tutemwe, tusangalale,
Kubute pe na ku mwesu;
Tucite bonse cisuma,
Tukange 'fi 'fya kwa Yesu.

6. Abana nangu banaka
Basende fye capindama;
Batemwe Yesu, balumbe,
batashe fyonse 'fyawama.

title: BANA BA KWA KRISTU
lyrics:
1. Bana ba kwa Kristu
Lintu muli mu nshila
Imbileni katula
'Milimo yakwe.

Tuleenda ku mwesu,
Mu nshila yakwa Lesa,
Bamo nabatangila,
Tukasanga bafika.

2. Inuneni amenso
Ku musumba wabuta,
'Nganda ilya e ya pe
'Mfumu yesu ilipo.

3. Mwilatina, enda fye,
'calo cilya cisuma;
Yesu Kristu mu nshila,
Aletwafwe nshiku pe.

4. Mwe Mfumu twasumna,
No kusule fya calo,
Imwe mule tubaka,
Twalakonka mu mpela.

title: YESU MFUMU ANTEMWA
lyrics:
1. Yesu Mfumu antenwa,
Ifi fine njishiba,
Bana bonse e bakwe
Banaka, wenya kosa

Yesu antemwa,
Cine antemwa,
Yesu antemwa,
'Fyebo fyanjebe fi

2. Yesu Mfumu antenwa,
'Mulu anjiwilile;
Alansambile fibi,
No kundeko kwingila.

3. Yesu Mfumu antenwa,
Mupepi muno nshila,
Nana nga namutemwa,
Akasenda ku mulu.

title: CAYEMBE CIBI 'CALO
MWICITA IFIBI
lyrics:
1. Mwicita ifibi,
Mwikalipa fye;
Yesu Amuteke
Bana ba Mwine.

2. Kristu aliwama
Aletemwesha;
Bana bakwe nabo
Babe basuma.

3. 'Ciwa cilebepa
Cilafwaya pe;
Catila mubifye,
Mucinakile.

4. Lelo mwilatesha
Mwilanakila;
Loleni ku Mfumu,
Muleikonka.

5. Kristu aliwama
Aletemwesha;
Bana bakwe nabo
Babe basuma.

title: UTWA M' YERUSALEMU
lyrics:
1. Utwa m' Yerusalem
Twatashishe Imfumu:
No twaice twa nomba
Twasanshako kulumba.

Ufweni, baleimba bana!
Ufweni, baleimba bana!
Sha malumbo, sha malumbo,
Sha Mfumu iyayana!

2. Twafundwa twitemwe,
Na ku fyebo tuteshe,
Twalangwe ya mu mulu:
Twatota, Mfumu Nkulu.

3. Na bana na bafyashi
Baimilo Mupashi;
Lwimbo ulu lukuku
Lufike na mu mulu.

title: NDESEKELA TATA WA MU MULU
lyrics:
1. Ndesekela Tata wa mu mulu
Anjebele fya kutemwa kwakwe:
Mu kalata ndemone fisuma,
Icacisha, Yesu alintemwa.

Ndesekelela, alintemwa,
Yesu, Yesu, alintemwa,
Ndesekelela, alintemwa,
Yesu alintemwa.

2. Nga namulaba no kwendauka
Alentemwa pe nangula nduba;
Ndebwelela bwangu kwa Katula.
Pa kwibukishe fyo alintemwa.

3. Lwimbo Iwandi ilyo nkalaimba,
Nga namone Mfumu ikankala
Mu kucindama kwakwe kwakula,
Ndesunguka. Yesu alintemwa.

4. Ndemutemwisha Yesu ne mwane;
Antemenwe, e co andumbwile,
Amfutilo bubi no mulopa;
'Cine cine, Yesu alintemwa.

5. Nga bambusha "Waishiba shani"
Nati, "Pantu Yasu amfwilile"
Mupashi wakwe amhimikila
Anange fyo Yasu alintamwa.

6. Ndi no mutende pakwishibisha;
Ndecetekela, nasansamuka;
Nombo mulwani afulumuka,
'Co namweba, "Yesu alintamwa."

title: YESU UWALI MU MULU
lyrics:
1. Yesu uwali mu mulu
Aishile pano muntu,
Mu lupapulo tumone
Ifyo wene aliwama.

2. Aendawike, ni Mfumu,
Apelya menso ku mpofu;
Aposeshe abalwele
Ababelele uluse.

3. Elyo abelele cine
Ca kwa Lesa, bacicite;
E wa cikuku, afuka,
Atemwo kumfwa ku Mwana.

4. Abantu bamufyengele,
Aimikwe, atanikwe,
Yalya mabako yawama
Ku muti bapampamine.

5. Awe! E co afumine
Ku mulu ni ku kwisa fwa;
Amalembo yaletweba:
Aleelela babipa.

6. Aishibe balibipa,
Ne fibi filabacusha,
Elyo asosa mu luse,
Nintemwa kuti mbafwile.

title: PE FYE LESA 'LIPO
lyrics:
1. Pe fye Lesa 'lipo,
Akulangumfwa,
Anjishiba mu ncito,
Na mu kwanga.

2. Pe fye Lesa 'lipo,,
Na mu bushiku,
Alamona pe na pe
nga mu lubuto.

3. Pe fye Lesa 'lipo,
Nangu mbe mwana,
Ifyo mona, 'fyo nsosa
Alifishiba.

title: MWE BANA, TEMWENI YESU
lyrics:
1. Mwe bana, temweni Yesu,
Amumina ku mulu;
Mulumbanishisho luse,
'Bupususho bukulu.

E cisuma, e cisums,
Ukulumbanya Yesu,
E cisuma, e cisums,
Ukulumbanya Yesu,

2. Ku mulu ilya 'fumine,
'Kwisa ikala pano,
Abana balimwimbile,
E camupele nseko

3. 'Lintu banyina batwele
Uko alya banono,
Mu mabokwo babumbile
Abapali bupalo.

4. Mwe bana, temweni Yesu,
Ni kaafwa wenu pe;
Kuno nga mwamulumbanya
Mukalalumbanya pe.

title: MUCITE MBE ULUBUTO
lyrics:
1. Mucite mbe ulubuto
Lwa kubengeshima,
'Kalubingu ka mulilo
Konse nakulaya.

2. Mucite mbe ilibula,
'Kusekasha bonse,
Ilyatemwo kubalula,
mwi bala lyacepa

3. Mucite mbe ulwimbo
'Kushusha bacula,
Ulwa kufumwye cikonko,
E, no kubakosha.

4. Mucite mbe umutambu
'kwafwa bashakosa,
Elyo no bumi na maka
Nabatumikila.

5. Muncitile, 'mweo wandi
Ube akalwimbo,
Aka malubo ya cine,
Na ka matotelo.

title: TATA TULEMUOTELA
lyrics:
1. Tata tulemutotela,
Pa budhiku na kasuba,
Butusho, filyo no luse,
Ne fyatupe nseko fyonse.

2. Mutwafwe tucite bwino,
No kuba ba luse 'lelo,
Mu milimo no kwangala,
Tukule mu bwina Lesa.

title: MWE LESA MULU BAKULU
lyrics:
1. Mwe Lesa muli bakulu!
Mwaba Tata na Katula!
Ine Mupina, mwancila,
Bene ba calo no mulu.

2. Muli Tata munsuminyo
Kutesha mapepo yandi!
Mumfwikisha malumbanyo
Nalumbanya ne mwaice..

3. Muli Tata muleke mbyo
Mwana watekanya wenu,
Mu mashiwi na mu ncito,
Mucite fintu mwatemwa.

4. Muli Tata ncetekele,
Muli imwe mwe Katula,
Mufwaya ndemubombela,
Conse camoneke bwino.

5. Muli Tata na pa kupwa,
'Nshiku shandi muno calo
Mumbule ne mu kutemwa
Njikale ne mwe ku mulu.

title: BA KWA LESA BAFUMINE
lyrics:
1. Ba kwa Lesa bafumine
Mu Egupti mu busha
Bali fye na bana pamo,
Balalola pasuma;
Abaice
Baleenda mu mpanga.

2. Bayawike na yordani,
Bafika ku kanaani,
Baikele umutende,
Ne fisuma bamwene
Aba bana
Mu nyimbo batotela.

3. Mwe katula, nefwe tube
Abalendo nga balya;
Imwe mwalitulubula
Ku fibi na ku ciwa,
Nomba nefwe
Twende ne mwe mu mpanga.

4. Yesu, mututungulule;
Mucinge ku kasuba;
Isuke mfifi ipite,
Mubutushe inshila;
Mututule
Kuli fyonse fyabipa.

5. Nga twafika pa mumana
watala wa mfifi,
Mube naifwe mu memshi,
Mutwabusho mutende;
Mufumye po
Umwenso wesu onse.

6. Ilyo lwendo lwesu lwapwa,
Tukamona pasuma;
Tukekala na bashila,
Abana ba mu ng'anda,
Fwe bashuka.
Tukalatasha Lesa.

title: NJISE KULI YESU
lyrics:
1. Njise kuli Yesu,
Alempe nseko;
Akulansekesha,
Ne wa cikonko.

Njise kuli Yesu,
Alempe nseko;
Akulansekesha,
Ne wa cikonko.

2. Njise kuli Yesu,
Omfwa mapepo,
Nao alentemwa.
Alempususha.

3. Njise kuli Yesu,
Akulansunga;
Alantungulula
Ku calo cipya.

4. Eko balya bana,
'Bafwikwa tutu;
Bamona Katula,
Ni yesu Kristu.

title: FYAPYA MWI BALA
lyrics:
1. Fyapya mwi bala,
Na basepa bace,
Tulecita shani,
Tuli baice,
Ku kwafwe mfumu ukusepa?

2. Shacepe ndupi,
Ne fyebo fyanaka,
Twafilwo kubomba;
Tuli na maka,
Bushe, kuyafwa ukusep?

3. Twakulapepa,
No kupele fyesu;
Twakulaikanya,
No kumfwa Yesu;
E kwafwe Mfumu ukusepa.

4. Ilyo twakula
Tukaba basepa,
'Batemwo kutumwa,
Nelyo kwalepa,
Ku kwafwe mfumu ukusepa.

title: MWE SHIFWE WA MU MULUIPEPO LWA KWA SHIKULWIFWE.
lyrics:
Mwe shifwe wa mu mulu,
Ishina lwenu licindikwe,
Ubufumu Bwenu bwuse;
Ukufwaya kwenu kucitwe panonse nga mu mulu
Mutupele ifyakulya fyesu ifya lelo.
Mutulekele imisha yesu, ifyp na ifwe tulekela abatulile misha.
(Mutwelele milandu yesu, ngefyo na ifwe twelala abatubale imilandu).
Mwitutwala mukweshowa, lelo mututule ku bubi.
Pantu ubufumu, na maka, no kucindama fyenu'
umuyayaya. Amen,

title: ISUBILO LYA BAPOSTOLI
ISUBILO (LYA CILYE CA NIKESA A. D. 325)
lyrics:
Nasubila muli Lesa umo, Shifwe wa maka yonse,
Kabumba wa mulu ne calo,
Ne fintu fyonse fyamoneka ne fishamoneka:
Na mu Mfumu imo Yesu Kristu, Mwana wafyalwa eka wa kwa Lesa.
Wafyalwa na Wishi pa ntanshi ya nshita shonse,
Lesa wakuli Lesa,
Lubuto lwa lubuto,
Lesa wine wine wa kuli Lesa wine wine,
Wafyalwa te kubumbwa,
Wa musango umo wine na Lesa Shifwe;
Muli uyo wine ifintu fyonse fyabumbilwe,
Uyo pali ifwe bantu, na pa bupususho bwesu, aikile ukufuma ku mulu,
No kufyalwa muli Mariya umushimbe na Mupashi wa Mushilo,
No kucitwa umuntu,
No kutanikwa pali ifwe kuli Pontio Pilato.
Aculile no kushikwa,
Ubushiku bwalengwa shitatu atutubwike kabinge,
Ukulingana na malembelo,
No kunina ku mulu,
No kwikala ku kuboko kwa kulyo kwa kwa Lesa Shifwe.
Uko akesa kabinga no lulumbi ukupingula abomi na bafwa:
Ubufumu bwakwe teti bukapwe iyo,
Kabili nasubila muli Mupashi wa Mushilo’
Mfumu na Kapela wa mweo,
Uyo watula kuli Lesa Shifwe no Mwana,
Uyo atotelwa no kulumbwa pamo na Lesa Shifwe no Mwana,
Uyo asosele no tunwa twa bakasesema.
Kabila nasubila mwi Eklesia limo,
Lya mushilo, lya bonse bene, lya bapostolo bene,
Nasubila mu Lubatisho lumo fye lwa kufulunganya kwa mpulumushi,
Kabili no kulolela ukututubuka kwa bafwa,
No mweo wa cala ico cikesa.

title: AMASHIWI YE SHUKO (MATEO 5: 3-10)
lyrics:
1. balishuka ababusu mu mitima; pantu ubufumu bwa mu mulu bwabo.
R Tushuke fi, Mfumu, twapapata.

2. balishuka abalosha; pantu bene bakasansamushiwa.
R Tushuke fi, Mfumu, twapapata.

3. Balishuka abafuka; pantu bakakwate calo.
R Tushuke fi, Mfumu, twapapata.

4. balishuka abali ne nsala ne cilaka ca bulungami; pantu bene bakekuta.
R Tushuke fi, Mfumu, twapapata.

5. balishuka aba luse; pantu bakabelelwo luse.
R Tushuke fi, Mfumu, twapapata.

6. balishuka abasanguluke mitima; pantu baka mona Lesa.
R Tushuke fi, Mfumu, twapapata.

7. balishuka abacito mutende; pantu baketwa abana ba kwa Lesa.
R Tushuke fi, Mfumu, twapapata.

8. balishuka abalamatilwa pa mulandu wa bulungami; pantu ubufuma bwa mu mulu bwabo.
R Tushuke fi, Mfumu, twapapata.

9. Muli abashuka ilyo bamupontela, no kumulamata, no kumwambo bufi icintu conse ca bubifi pa mulandu wa ine; sekeleleni no kwanga, pantu icilambu cenu cikalamba mu mulu; pantu e fyo balamete bakasesema ba ntanshi.
R Lembeni fye shuko, mu mitima, Mfumu.

title: LESA AKUPALE (IMPENDWA 6: 24-26)
LESA AKUPALE (IMPENDWA 6: 24-26)
lyrics:
1. Nomba, we Mwine lubanda, muleke umusha wenu aye, aye umutende umwabele shiwi lyenu;

2. Pa kuti amenso yandi yamone pusukilo lyenu.

3. Ilyo mwapekanisha kuccinso ca bantu na ‘bantu.

4. Ku kubo lubuto lwa kusokolwela Abena fyalo.

No bukata bwa bantu benu abena Israele.

Ululumbi lube Kuli Lesa Shifwe, na ku Mwana, n ku Mupashi wa Mushilo:

Ifintu lwali mu butendeko; efyo lwaba
nomba, efyo lwakulaba pe na pe. Amen.

title: ULULUMBI (GLORIA IN EXCELSIS)
lyrics:
1. Ululumbi lube ku mulu kuli Lesa, no mu tende mu calo, ubusuma ku bantu.

2. Twamulumbanya, twamucindika, twamutotela, twamufukamina,

3. Twamuletela ululumbi pa mulandu wa lulumbi lwenu lukalamba,

4. Mwe Mfumu Lesa, kateka wa ku mulu, Lesa Shifwe wa maka yonse.

5. Mwe Mfumu, Mwana wafyalwa eka Yesu Kristu;

6. Mwe Mfumu Lesa, Mwana wa mpanga wa kwa Lesa, wa kwa Lesa Shifwe,

7. Mwe bafumya imembu shs calo, mutubelel uluse

8. Mwe bafumya imembu shs calo, mutubelele uluse.

9. Mwe bafumya imembu shs calo, mupokele ipepo lyesu.

10. Mwe baikala ku kuboku kwa kulyo kwa kwa Lesa Shifwe mutubelele uluse.

11. Pantu Imwe mweka fye muli Mushilo; Imwe mweka fye muli Mfumu
Imwe mweka, mwe Kristu, pamo no Mupashi wa Mushilo, muli wa pa mulu mu lulumbi lwa kwa Lesa Shifwe. Amen

title: ULWIMBO LWA KWA MARIA (LUKA 1: 46-55)
lyrics:
1. Umutima wandi uletasha Shikulu

2. No mweo wandi waangile Lesa Katula wandi;

3. Pantu alolesha pa bulanda bwa musha kwake. Pantu, moneni, ukufuma kuli nomba aba nkulo shonse bakanumbulo washuka

4. Pantu Uwa maka ancitila fikalamba. Kabili lya mushilo ishina lyakwe.

5. No luse lwakwe lwa ku nkuli ne nkulo ku bamutina.

6. Acita ca maka ku kuboku kwakwe. Asalanganya aba miya mu kwelenganya kwa mitima yabo,

7. Abakata abesha pa fupuna fya bufumu, Na ‘balanda abasansabika,

8. Aba nsala abekusha fisuma, na ‘ba fyuma abafumyako iminwe mikutwa.

9. Ayatwa kalume wakwe Isreale, ukwibukisho kubelelo luse,

10. (Ifyo asosele ku fikolwe fyesu) kuli Abrahamu no bufyashi bwakwe, umuyayaya.
Ululumbi lube kuli Lesa Shifwe, na ku Mwana, na ku Mupashi wa Mushilo.
Ifintu lwali mu butendeko: efyo lwaba na nomba, efyo lwakulaba pe na pe. Amen.

title: ULWIBO LWA KWA ZAKARIA (LUKA 1: 68-79)
lyrics:
1. Abe uwapalwa Lesa wa kwa Israele,
Pa kuti napempula abantu bakwe,
no kuba citile cilubula;

2. Kabili atwimikilo lusengo lwe pisikilo,
Mu ng’anda ya mubomfi wakwe Dabidi-

3. Ifyo alandile kale umuyayaya mu tunwa twa ba mushilo,
bakasesema bakwe; ku kututula ku balwani besu,
Na ku maboko ya bonse abatupata; ku kucito luse ku fikolwe fyesu,
no kwibukishe layano lwakwe lwa lya mushilo,

4. umulopa uo alapila kuli Abrahamu icikolwe cesu,

5. ukuti, pa kuba abapokololwa ku maboko ya balwani besu.

6. Atupele ukuba aba kumupyungila ukabulo mwenso,

7. Mu mushilo na mu bulungami ku menso yakwe inshiku shesu shonse.

8. Awe na iwe, we mwana, uketwa kasesema wa Wapulamo;
pantu ukatangilila ku cinso ka kwe Shikulu ku kupekanye nshila shakwe.

9. Ku kulanga bantu bakwe ukwishibe pusukilo
Mu kulekelelwe membu shabo,

10. Pa mulandu wa luse lwa cikuku ulwa kwa Lesa wesu,
umukesa tupempwilo kuca kwa mu mulu uwapulamo,

11. Ku kubalikila pa baikala mu mfifi na mu cinshingwa ca mfwa,
Ululumbi lube kuli Lesa Shifwe, na ku
Mwana, na ku Mupashi wa Mushilo.

Ifintu lwali mu butendeko; efyo lwaba na nomba,
efyo lwakulaba pen a pe.
Amen.

title: TWAMULUMBANYA IMWE MWE LESA
lyrics:
1. Twamulumbanya Imwe, mwe Lesa: twasumina ukuti Imwe muli Mfumu.

2. Icalo conse cilemutotela: mwe shifwe wa pe na pe.

3. Bamutotela na bangeli bonse: ne myulu na ba make bonse abaikalamo.

4. Kuti Imwe Bacelubi na Baselafi: bemba no kuleka iyo.

5. Mwe Mushilo, Mwe Mushilo, Mwe Mushilo: Mfumu Lesa wa mabumbwa.

6. Umulu ne calo: fyaisula no lulumbi lwenu.

7. Bapostolo mu cilonganino caba ca kutasha: bamulumbanya Imwe.

8. Bakasesema mu kwafwana kwabo kwawamisha: bamulumbanya Imwe.

9. Bamufwilile mu mabumba yabo ayacindama: bamulumbanya Imwe.

10. Eklesia lya mushilo mu fyalo fyonse: Iyasuminisha Imwe.

11. Mwe Lesa Shifwe: mwe ba lulumbi lushakapwe:

12. No Mwana wenu wacindikwa wa cine uwafyelwe eka:

13. Pamo no Mupashi waMushilo Kasansamusha.

14. Imwe muli Mfumu ya lulumbi mwe Kristu:

15. Muleikalilila pe Umwana wa kwa Lesa Shifwe.

16. Ilintu mwaiminine kupususha abantu: tamwasulile fumo lya Mushimbe.

17. Ilintu mwapwile ukwansho kucula kwa mfwa, mwabeswila bonse abasubila Bufumu bwa ku mulu.

18. Mwaikala ku kuboko kwa kulwo kwa kwa Lesa: mu lulumbu lwa kwa Shifwe.

19. Twasubila ukuti mukesa kabili ku kutupingula.

20. Eco twapapata mubafwa abatu benu: abo mwalubula no mulopa wabulo mutengo.

21. Mubapende mu mulongo wa basalwa benu: mu lulumbi lya pen a pe.

22. Mwe Mfumu , mubapusushe abantu benu: no kupala ba bupyani bwenu.

23. Mubatungulule: no kubasumbula pe,

24. Nshiku ne nshiku twamulumbanya:

25. Kabinga twatotela Ishina lyenu mu nshita shonse pen a pe.

26. Twamupapata, mwe Mfumu: mutucinge lelo line ku mpulumushi.

27. Mwe Mfumu, mutubelele uluse, mutubelele uluse.

28. Mwe Mfumu, mutulangilile uluse lwenu,Ngefyo twacetekela muli Imwe:

29. Mwe Mfumu, muli Imwe nincetekela,
Mwindeka nsebane iyo.

title: KALE UBUSHIKU
lyrics:
1. Kale ubushiku
Yesu afyelwe
Aishile panshi
wana munono
Lelo ncede isuma
Tayasangwile
Pa ku fyalwa kwakwe
Kale na kale.

2. Mu mulu bangeli
Balemwimbila
Fyonse alekele
Kwikala panshi
Acendeme mu cani
Ngombe shalila
Takwe ing'anda
Pano pa calo.

3. Abangeli mu muli
Bamalaika
Balemulumbanya
Kulya ku mulu
Pano panshi banyina
Bamulelele
Bamufukatile
Mulya mwi tanga.

4. Bushe ne mupina
Ndemupela nshi?
Nga nali kakumba
ndepele mpanga
Nga nali wa mano
Ndepele fyuma
Cinshi ndemupela?
Mutima wandi.

title: MWE BAKACEMA MU MPANGA
lyrics:
1. Mwe ba kacema mu mpanga
Mutwebw ifya bangeli
Bushe bamwebele shani
Bulya bushiku bwine?

Gloria in Excelsis Deo.

2. Twamwene cine cine
Lesa Mukulu mwine
Mu mubili wa buntunse
kanya kene mwi tanga.

3. Ba mu mulu baleimba
Umutende ku bantu
Fya mu mulu filelila
Icawamishe cibi.

4. Awe mukwai bakacema
Mwashimikisha cine
Tuye bonse tumumone
Lesa aisa kuli ifwe.

title: FIMUTI FYA MU MPANGA
lyrics:
1. Fimuti fya mu mpanga
Ne filimbwa fyonse,
Fileanga no kucinda
Ubushiku bwa lelo.

Kasuba katula
Inana shileenda
Fyonse fya mweo fileimba
Na bana baanga.

2. Fimuti fyabalula
Maluba yabuta
Iluba lyesu Yesu Kristu
Ilyabuta tutu.

3. Fimuti filetwala
Mbuto shakashila
Mulopa wa kwa Yesu Kristu
Wapususha abantu.

4. Fimuti fya myunga
Filecena bantu
Yesu kristu acenenwe
Pa kutulubula.

5. Awa fyatambalika
Misambo yafiko
Yesu alitambalikule
Amaboko yakwe.

title: KWAFYALILWE KULI FWE
lyrics:
1. kwafyalilwe kuli fwe
Mfumu ya fyalo fyonse
Ku kupususha bantu
Afumine ku mulu.

2. Mu mukonda alele
Umo finama fyaba
Lelo filya fyamwene
Umwana wa bupapo.

3. Shamfumu sha panonse
Shali no bufuba,
Shaipeye 'baice
Abali mu Betle'mu.

4. Mwana uyu aishile
Kale mu kutemwa,
Awamya imitima
No lubuto lwa cine,

5. We mwana wakwa Mary,
Mututungulule
Mu nshila ya panonse
Na ku mwesu ku mulu.

6. Aleluya mwe Mwana
Mfumu ya kutemwa!
Twapunda no buseko
Ululumbi, lulumbi.

title: BUSHIKU BWASHILA
lyrics:
1. Bushiku bwashila
Abantu tondolo
Kwaiso lubuto tutu
Afyalwa Katula wesu
Aleto mutende
Mutende wa pe.

2. Bushiku bwashila
Krustu alelelwa
Mukondo e busanshi bwakwe
Kwisa kwa Mupusushi
Twimbe 'Aleluya!'
Twimbe 'Aleluya!'

title: YEMWE BETLEHEMU
lyrics:
1. Yemwe Betlehemu
E mushi uwapalwa,
Yemwe Betlehemu
E mushi uwapalwa.

2. Mary anakile
Pa kufika ku mushe
Balangilwe mulya,
Mwi tanga lya ng'ombe.

3. Bushiku bwine ube
Lutanda lwamoneka
Lwaibele sana
Ku ntanda sha mulu.

4. Bakakumba eba-
Balilyo kumfwa mbila,
Mungeli aikile
Abebele cine.

5. Mwe Mfumu twatotela
Pa bushiku busuma,
Pa bafyashi besu,
Pa bumu busuma.

title: MUTENDE KU BANTU BONSE
lyrics:
1. Mutende ku bantu bonse
Ishiwi lya ku mulu,
Lyaletelwe na bangeli,
Pa kufyalwa kwakwe 'lelo

Shimeni bena kristu
Shimeni Calo conse,
Caikala na bulanda

2. Abaleumfwa bangeli,
Banayo bwali bwangu,
Bena fyalo bese balye,
Pa kufyalwa kwakwe 'lelo.

3. Abaleumfwa bangeli
Bakosho mulilo
Bena fyalo bekalepo,
Pa kufyalwa kwakwe 'lelo.

4. Baleumfwa bangeli
besule fibi fyonse
Bena fyalo bengilemo,
Pa kufyalwa kwakwe 'lelo.

5. Mwe baleumfwa bangeli
Yesu Kristu atweba
Ku kutemwana na bonse
Pa kufyalwa kwakwe 'lelo.

title: FWE BALENDO TWAFUMA KONSE KONSE
lyrics:
1. Fwe balendo twafuma konse konse
Tuli kuno ku kufwaye Mfumu
Tuli basha tatukwete ubuteko
Ifwe tuli abalanda. Owe owe
Uwa kutwafwa twafwaya.

2. Ni ku maca e kumwesu fwe bantu
Mpepo yeka calo ca ku mwesu twakabila
Ulubuto ulwa mweo,
Ifwe tuli ba mfifi. Ulubuto
Twakabila mutipele.

3. Ku kapinda mufyalo fya kasuba
Tatufuma tulila mwi bomba tatwishibe
Amafunde ya bantu,
Tatukwete amano. Amafunde
Ne nshila tulekabila

4. Ku kabanga ubufumu bwa kale
E kumwesu tuli na mafinde
Ne fwe pamo twabulwa ntungulushi
Uwa kutupususha mweo ne mfwa
Twaliluba pano panshi.

5. Ku masamba mu fyalo fikankala,
Mano, fyuma twakwata e fyafye,
Imitima ilecula ne nsala
Uwa kutwafwa nani? Yesu, Yesu!
Ali kwi? Tulemufwaya.

6. Mfumu yesu, awe nomba twafika
Mweo wesu no lubuto lwesu
Muli imwe tulemona inshila,
Intungulushi yesu. Lesa wesu
Twakulamukonka pa fye.

title: BALANDA, BAFUKE
lyrics:
1. Balanda, bafuke,
Filema, ne mpofu,
Mwendeshe, teti mutine
Imfumu ya mweo
No luse lwafula
Yaisa kwikala nefwe.

2. Ba mano bashile
No bupe ne fyuma,
Ne ngombe shapele fyani
Yesu mu mukondo
Apokelel fyonse,
Umwana mufuke ulya.

3. Ne fwe tupalame
Ne nseko,no kwanga,
Tutwalile ubupe bwesu,
Yesu Kristu Mfumu,
Afyaya ne lelo
Ubupe bwa mweo yesu.

title: LINTU YESU AFYELWE
lyrics:
1. Lintu Yesu afyelwe
Kwanoneka lutanda
Lwaibela mu ntanda
Shonse sha mulu

2. Baice balumwene
Batina no kututuma
Kutemwa kwa kwa Lesa,
Kwabeba mwitina,

3. Baice babutwike
Baile kwi tanga
Basenda maluba
Ku kupelo mwana.

4. Bafukama no mucinshi,
Balolekesha Mwana
Batemwa basekela,
Bamutotela.

5. Bafumu bwa kwa Lesa
Bwamoneka mu bana,
'Wapokelelo Mwana,
Apokelele Mfumu.

title: TATA WESU WA MU MULU
lyrics:
1. Tata wesu wa mu mulu,
'Shina licindikwe,
'Bufumu bwisho, bufwayo
Bucitwe panonse.

2. Mutupe lelo ifilyo,
Mutwelele fibi,
Ifyo twelela banensu,
Abatubale fwe.

3. Mwituleta mu kweshiwa,
Mupokolole fwe,
'Lulumbi pe na pe.

title: LESA SHIPALENI AFRIKA
lyrics:
Lesa shipaleni Afrika;
Sansuleni lusengo lwenu;
Umfweni amapepo Yesu,
Lesa, mutupale,
Ifwe fwe bana benu.

Mwise, Mfumu
Ya mushilo.
Lesa, mutupale,
Ifwe fwe bana benu.

title: MUPALE CI CALO
lyrics:
1. Mupale ci calo,
Amaka ya mulu
Yacibaka.
‘Mutende ube pe,
Abantu baleke
Ukulwe nshiku pe;
Mucipale

2. Mubake shamfumu,
Ubumu bwa mulu
Mushipele.
Shibe sha mutende,
Shange, shisekele,
Shiteke no luse,
Mushipale.

3. Mutule abantu,
Batemwe Kristu,
Babe bakwe.
Bafume mu mfifi,
Bakonke Mfumwi yi,
Mubatule

title: KULI LESA TULETO
lyrics:
Kuli Lesa tuletota,
Ifintu fyonse atupa,
Toteni bonse mu mulu,
Wishi, Mwana no Mupashi.

title: KULI LESA TULETOTA
lyrics:
1. Kamupalamine,
Lesa wandi,
Ngo mwenso wandeta
Unko muli;
'Lwimbo Iwandi lube:
Kanupalamine,
Lesa wandi.

2. Nga ndi mu Bulendo,
Naililwa,
'Mfifi yafitisha,
Nalalafye.
Mu ciloto mpepa:
Kamupalamine,
Lesa wandi.

3. Llyo nasamina
Mutwe pe bwe,
No busanshi bwandi
Ni pa nshi fye;
Elyo mpepa, ntila:
Kamupal amine,
Lesa wandi.

4. 'Lintu nashibuka,
Natotela,
E lyo natole bwe,
Ncite Betel.
Mu bulanda ntila:
Kamupalamine,
Lesa wandi.

5. 'Lintu nkashe calo,
Nkapupuka,
Nugame ku mulu
Uko muli.
No lu Iwimbo lube:
Kamupalamine.
Lesa wandi.
